idea_1: This feature divides how-to videos into steps, allows looping and speed control, displays a transparent overlay using the front camera, and saves your progress.
idea_2: This feature allows you to share video suggestions with small groups using a brief note and a rating. It adds a “From your friends” section and an “Ask my circle” button on search and video pages.
idea_3: This feature displays weather forecasts and time details for locations mentioned in videos, synced with the video timeline, and allows users to save places to a trip list for export.
idea_4: This feature separates speech from background sounds, adjusts audio levels, syncs subtitle highlights with speech, and allows long-press controls to increase speech or lower background noise.
idea_5: This feature allows you to filter videos by channel, keyword, duration, language, region, topic, and date, save and share filters, and temporarily pause topics.
idea_6: This feature allows creators to attach files such as PDFs, slides, code, or spreadsheets to specific video timestamps, enabling users to view, download, and switch between them and the video.
idea_7: This feature displays nearby creators, events, and meetups on a map with distance filters and safety settings. Users can RSVP or set reminders for live sessions.
idea_8: This feature displays real-time safety and weather alerts on live streams with location tags, offering viewers and streamers information about evacuation routes and shelters.
idea_9: This feature automatically downloads audio-only files from selected channels or playlists on Wi-Fi, adds AI-generated chapter titles and text summaries, and allows offline access within a daily limit.
idea_10: This feature displays comment credibility based on topic reputation and helpfulness, lets creators require verified identities for commenters, and allows adding timestamped evidence for visibility badges.

idea_1: This feature allows creators to upload multiple video scenes with choice points, letting viewers select different paths and providing creators with branch-specific data and optional member-only endings.
idea_2: This feature lets you tap objects in a paused video to identify them, access related moments, or open links using on-device data or creator tags.
idea_3: This feature allows users to record their camera and voice reactions linked to specific video times, overlay them on the video, and lets creators manage and monetize these overlays.
idea_4: This feature lets friends watch videos together with a shared queue, synchronized playback, voice chat, and emoji reactions on mobile, TV, and desktop devices.
idea_5: This feature organizes playlists into learning paths with quizzes, practice sections, review sessions, and progress tracking, allowing creators to award completions and receive payments.
idea_6: This feature allows viewers to skip or collapse marked sponsor segments, supports creators with small payments from a shared fund, and provides sponsor cards for later viewing.
idea_7: This feature allows you to search your watch history using voice or text with general descriptions and shows exact timestamps with preview clips to jump to.
idea_8: This feature tests various video intros, titles, and thumbnails during the first 5–15 seconds, automatically choosing the best option and displaying tap-level drop-off heatmaps.
idea_9: This feature changes playback speed by slowing down during on-screen actions and speeding up during pauses or repeated narration, with settings for each channel or video.
idea_10: This feature syncs videos from multiple creators at the same event, letting viewers switch angles or use picture-in-picture, while tracking watch time for revenue sharing.

idea_1: This feature offers a private space with AI prompts, trace overlays, and short lessons for drawing, lettering, and logos, where friends can leave timed private annotations.
idea_2: This feature improves audio by making dialogue clearer, lowering background noise, and adjusting sound after a hearing check. It also adds captions, vibration alerts, and voice volume controls.
idea_3: This feature allows users to write short reviews for accounts they follow and provides a feed of recommended accounts based on friends’ activity, with follow or mute options.
idea_4: This feature lets users post short video or text reviews on tagged products and places, which are organized on a Reviews tab and displayed on a map with spam filtering.
idea_5: This feature allows users to browse nearby creators for collaborations, events, or study groups, with options for profile verification, distance limits, intent tags, messaging, and scheduling.
idea_6: This feature lets users view a creator’s subscriber-only posts, live videos, and chats for a limited time set by the creator.
idea_7: This feature displays temporary photos, Reels, and event updates from nearby users. Hosts can manage their content, and viewers can adjust visibility and safety settings.
idea_8: This feature lets users download posts, Reels, and music to a secure cache for offline access, sync offline likes and saves, and manages storage space.
idea_9: This feature displays a numeric code in Stories or Live that viewers can enter or tap to make donations, tips, or purchases, with payments processed inside the app.
idea_10: This feature displays weather forecasts on the map and scheduler, suggests times for shooting, adds weather badges to outdoor posts, and sends alerts with safety tips and local updates.

idea_1: This feature lets creators add alternate clips at certain points in Reels, allowing viewers to tap and choose different story paths to watch multiple outcomes.
idea_2: This feature automatically translates and dubs Reels and Lives into different languages in near real time, syncing lips and voice, and displays captions and audio in the chosen language.
idea_3: This feature lets multiple users record the same event at the same time from different phones, then syncs their videos into one timeline for viewing and editing.
idea_4: This feature creates temporary shared albums based on location for events, allowing attendees to add Stories or Reels with permission. It summarizes content and deletes the album afterward.
idea_5: This feature allows users to control their appearance in photos or videos by requiring approval or blurring before content with them is shared publicly.
idea_6: This feature allows users to choose topic filters and mood sliders to change the content shown in their Explore and Reels feeds and search results right away.
idea_7: This feature lets users long-press items in Reels or Stories to view visually similar products with price ranges, sustainability details, and exact matches when available.
idea_8: This feature allows creators to add additional content like credits, sources, settings, or behind-the-scenes clips that fans can view after meeting specific conditions.
idea_9: This feature summarizes comments, identifies repeated questions, provides one-tap reply suggestions, and allows users to create Stories or Reels displaying the original comment.
idea_10: This feature publishes scheduled posts in stages according to each follower’s local active times, offers analytics for each stage, and keeps likes and comments combined.

idea_1: This feature pauses scenes to show filmmaking explanations, lets users earn skill badges, and allows saving annotated clips for later viewing or sharing.
idea_2: This feature adjusts audio according to your hearing profile and earbuds, enhancing speech clarity and reducing loud sounds, with settings that vary for each title.
idea_3: This feature creates and downloads a playlist based on your travel time, internet availability, and destinations. It can access your calendar and update titles for offline use.
idea_4: This feature allows users to find nearby people for synchronized watch parties online or in public, using optional profiles with verification and moderation.
idea_5: This feature lets users label reviews with tone, pacing, and content warnings, provides spoiler-free summaries of opinions, and enables following reviewers with similar tastes.
idea_6: This feature allows users to filter recommendations by length, mood, intensity, and content warnings, skip scenes with specific tags, and set or lock filters for each profile.
idea_7: This feature tracks weather alerts, automatically downloads selected shows using minimal battery, pauses large downloads on weak networks, and resumes them when the connection improves.
idea_8: This feature allows users to select extra audio tracks, such as director commentaries, critic explanations, or community recordings, that play synchronized information during episodes.
idea_9: This feature lets users order snacks from local partners for delivery timed with the show start, supports one-tap reordering, group orders, and contactless drop-off.
idea_10: This feature provides audio-only playback with scene descriptions, enables downloading small files for offline use, and offers a Car Mode with large controls, voice search, and kid-safe queues.

idea_1: This feature automatically creates and downloads video bundles matching your available 15, 30, or 60-minute time slots, then deletes them after you finish watching.
idea_2: This feature allows users to search for scenes by quotes, lyrics, props, or locations and jump directly to the exact moment using timecodes and thumbnails.
idea_3: This feature hides thumbnails, cast updates, and descriptions beyond your current progress in the app and shared links, showing content only up to your latest watched episode.
idea_4: This feature offers a 3–5 minute summary of previous seasons based on characters and storylines you have followed, with options for detailed or brief versions before a new episode.
idea_5: This feature allows your phone to display synced information such as cast, music, locations, and trivia for each scene when pointed at your TV, using pre-downloaded data offline.
idea_6: This feature allows users to long-press to capture a 5–20 second clip with captions and a link to the specific moment, which can be shared and viewed by others.
idea_7: This feature allows users to create a room, invite friends, suggest shows based on shared preferences and restrictions, propose times, and start a watch party immediately.
idea_8: This feature displays two subtitles on mobile, lets users tap words to translate and hear pronunciation, creates vocabulary lists from watched content, and connects review cards to scenes.
idea_9: This feature allows you to set a desired episode length by skipping recaps, removing sections, and changing playback speed, with all adjustments reversible and indicated.
idea_10: This feature blurs mature thumbnails, hides suggestive images, mutes autoplay trailers, and changes notifications to vibrations for discreet Netflix use in public.

idea_1: This feature offers brief writing exercises based on your previous documents, tracks your progress with skill badges, and highlights areas where you can improve.
idea_2: This feature simplifies long sentences, adjusts contrast and spacing, highlights unclear parts, and offers an audio readout to help with reading and reviewing documents.
idea_3: This feature allows you to select a document type, add sections such as FAQs or charts, set word counts for each part, and generate a customizable outline before writing.
idea_4: This feature allows you to schedule review rounds, assign document sections to individuals, monitor response times, and recommend frequent reviewers from your contacts.
idea_5: This feature lets users send and receive Kudos for comments, edits, and accepted suggestions, tracked by AI and author approval, which can be shared or used for benefits.
idea_6: This feature offers timed writing sessions that monitor focused time, set section goals, track daily streaks, and enable teams to combine points for shared rewards or donations.
idea_7: This feature allows you to use a premium tool for 24 hours on a copy of your document without signing up, adds a watermark, and supports easy undo.
idea_8: This feature lets you search for co-authors, reviewers, or experts by topic, institution, or location using verified profiles with privacy controls.
idea_9: This feature creates a Review Card from a selected section to request specific feedback, collect responses, gather helpfulness ratings, and generate AI-based summaries.
idea_10: This feature identifies phone numbers, addresses, dates, and IBANs in a document and converts them into clickable links for calling, mapping, or calendar actions.

idea_1: This feature allows you to tag paragraphs or images with audience labels and share a document that displays content according to the viewer’s assigned label.
idea_2: This feature lets phones connect using Bluetooth or Wi-Fi Direct without internet, share changes, and later sync updates to the cloud with conflict notifications.
idea_3: This feature lets you press and hold to add a voice note linked to specific text, transcribes it automatically, syncs playback with highlighted text, and supports voice replies.
idea_4: This feature shows a timeline with color-coded markers indicating where edits were made. Users can navigate through time to view, copy, or restore specific sentences.
idea_5: This feature detects personal information, legal names, IDs, and secrets, enabling users to remove or hide this sensitive data for certain viewers.
idea_6: This feature lets you capture a photo of a whiteboard, receipt, or diagram and add it to a document. It converts text and tables into editable content and allows retakes without losing links or history.
idea_7: This feature allows you to start a short audio meeting within a document on mobile, transcribes the conversation, generates summaries, and lists action items with assigned owners.
idea_8: This feature allows multiple users to add and use interactive elements like polls, timers, and calculators simultaneously, with results organized in tables and connected to notifications or tasks.
idea_9: This feature collapses sections into summaries, lets users adjust the reading level, and provides options for pacing and contrast to support different reading needs.
idea_10: This feature allows you to assign approvers and due dates to headings, lock approved sections, track status, reopen sections with changes, and export approval history.

idea_1: This feature offers short lessons and a practice space for email drafts, gives feedback on tone, clarity, and inclusivity, and tracks progress over time.
idea_2: This feature allows you to invite teammates to Outlook Circles to share templates, rules, and calendars, and offers new members suggestions based on your activity.
idea_3: This feature transcribes voice emails and meeting recordings into text, enhances audio quality for attachments, and offers vibration alerts and captions for silent information access.
idea_4: This feature allows you to drag and drop content blocks such as agenda, availability picker, files, approvals, and polls into emails and save them for reuse.
idea_5: This feature lets you test Copilot, advanced rules, and booking pages with sample data outside your mailbox, and allows you to reset or export chosen settings.
idea_6: This feature displays sender verification, shared contacts, and reply patterns, and suggests nearby or event attendees for connection when traveling, with user permission.
idea_7: This feature allows you to turn on Review Mode in a thread to gather upvotes, comments, and suggested edits, then creates and shares a summary message.
idea_8: This feature monitors inbox activity, response times, and focus periods, enabling users to accumulate points that can be redeemed for Microsoft 365 benefits or donations.
idea_9: This feature shows travel information such as flight status, gate, weather, maps, and expense rules from your calendar and suggests changes if travel plans might be impacted.
idea_10: This feature identifies dial-ins, meeting IDs, and OTP codes in emails and shows them as quick actions above threads for easy access and dialing through the device or Teams.

idea_1: This feature identifies the best times to send emails based on recipients’ availability and past responses, can send emails automatically, and schedule reminders for unread messages.
idea_2: This feature allows you to create a task and generates a message that includes a subject, action items, approval options, due dates, reminders, and escalation steps.
idea_3: This feature adds a status bar to each email thread showing “On me,” “Waiting on them,” or “Blocked,” and highlights decisions, owners, and deadlines for reminders or tasks.
idea_4: This feature detects file versions in an email thread, displays their differences, updates sharing permissions, and directs recipients to the latest OneDrive version.
idea_5: This feature displays a heatmap of your day using meetings, context switches, travel, and time zones. It identifies focused work times and can decline low-priority invites automatically.
idea_6: This feature organizes flight and hotel emails into an itinerary, offers one-tap check-in, updates gate and local time changes, adjusts meetings, and sends travel delay notifications.
idea_7: This feature connects an email thread to a Teams or approved chat channel, sends chat replies as regular email summaries, and lets users set a time for the connection to end.
idea_8: This feature allows you to create custom swipe actions that perform tasks such as labeling, forwarding, or scheduling emails, and use or share them across devices and widgets.
idea_9: This feature allows you to queue swipes, replies, and scheduled sends while offline and automatically updates them when you reconnect to the internet.
idea_10: This feature detects when an email is sent from the wrong account and suggests the correct account, signature, and sensitivity labels. It also creates and manages disposable aliases for incoming mail.

idea_1: This feature generates brief tasks from stored files, monitors changes over time, and lets users invite others to give feedback without sharing entire folders.
idea_2: This feature processes stored audio and video by adjusting volume levels, reducing background noise, adding captions, and providing options for hearing profiles and distant voice enhancement.
idea_3: This feature allows you to select files, change their formats, add watermarks, set access permissions and expiration, include eSign steps, and share files through email, links, QR codes, or Nearby Drop.
idea_4: This feature checks stored files for errors, shows data backup status and possible issues, recommends fixes, and can automatically plan repairs to keep data intact.
idea_5: This feature records activities such as enabling two-factor authentication, organizing files, and making referrals, enabling users to earn credits redeemable for extra storage and services.
idea_6: This feature allows temporary access to advanced functions for 24 hours and provides a summary of your activity after the period ends.
idea_7: This feature finds nearby users for temporary file transfers via Bluetooth or LAN and uses verification methods such as domain checks and one-time codes to establish connections.
idea_8: This feature allows users to add review requests to shared files, enabling recipients to give ratings, emojis, or feedback, with results combined across file versions.
idea_9: This feature generates a 6-digit code that permits one-time file access within a specified time frame, tracks usage limits, and records the retrieval event.
idea_10: This feature saves travel documents and folders for selected dates and locations offline, updates them automatically, and recommends backups when weather or outage alerts occur.

idea_1: This feature creates an encrypted index on your device to enable local file searches by meaning, and it synchronizes the index securely across your devices.
idea_2: This feature creates links that restrict access by location, device, network, and time, updates security keys, and adds authentication without altering the original link.
idea_3: This feature identifies personal information in files, creates a redacted version for sharing, keeps the original file unchanged, and shows a preview of the hidden content.
idea_4: This feature divides data into parts using erasure coding and stores them across Dropbox and optional third-party clouds, enabling data recovery from partial information.
idea_5: This feature lets users enter a PIN to access a separate folder with selected files, restricts access to sensitive data, and can notify trusted contacts.
idea_6: This feature enables devices to share encryption keys directly through Bluetooth or Wi-Fi Direct by scanning a QR code, without using a server or needing an Internet connection.
idea_7: This feature allows users to view media and PDFs with watermarks, restricts downloads by default, adds recipient-specific marks, dims screenshots, and requires verification for one-time downloads.
idea_8: This feature verifies device details like mobile attestation, OS version, screen lock, and jailbreak/root status before decryption, and limits access on unsecured Wi-Fi networks.
idea_9: This feature establishes an encrypted local connection between nearby users to share file updates, enabling faster synchronization of large files and reducing mobile data use.
idea_10: This feature saves encrypted app data backups using user-held keys, creates incremental snapshots, and enables restoring selected data to a new device with secure access.

idea_1: This feature offers brief lessons and AR overlays while browsing or buying DIY, art, cooking, or maker items, tracks progress, suggests related products, and enables sharing with others.
idea_2: This feature allows you to create product bundles by choosing a base item and modifying options, displays current prices and availability, and saves presets for future orders.
idea_3: This feature allows you to share a product as a poll with selected contacts and receive their ranked choices, reactions, and comments on the product page.
idea_4: This feature allows users to earn points by playing games, answering trivia, or completing surveys, which can be exchanged for coupons, gift card credits, or donations.
idea_5: This feature shows delivery estimates based on weather, suggests packing lists for destinations, and lets users change shipment locations during severe weather.
idea_6: This feature displays an authenticity card on each listing with review quality, seller history, ID verification status, return rates, and indicators of possible fake reviews.
idea_7: This feature improves audio and captions in product videos and live streams by offering speech boost, noise reduction, multi-language captions, searchable transcripts, and adjustable clarity settings.
idea_8: This feature saves searches and product pages for offline access, queues actions like adding items to the cart for later syncing, and reduces data use with compressed images or text-only mode.
idea_9: This Feature allows you to create and save filters with rules, sorting options, and price alerts, apply them to categories, share filters, and subscribe to others’ updates.
idea_10: This feature allows you to add compatible accessories to a product, updates weight, fit, and power limits, and provides 3D/AR previews with export options.

idea_1: This feature suggests product bundles based on purchase history and device models, lets users set budget and quality preferences, and adjusts items accordingly.
idea_2: This feature allows users to place multiple items in one AR scene anchored in their room, automatically checks item sizes, and lets users save, share, and get matching suggestions.
idea_3: This feature allows users to enable Gift Mode, which hides browsing activity, orders, and recommendations, provides masked notifications, neutral packaging, and a temporary incognito search history.
idea_4: This feature provides a product care hub for each item, displaying warranty details, manuals, consumables, lifespan timers, repair guides, and options to order certified spare parts.
idea_5: This feature displays carbon and packaging impact for each shipping option, including batch-to-locker with reusable totes, and offers credits for eco-friendly choices and grouped delivery times.
idea_6: This feature automatically credits you if a product’s price drops soon after purchase and lets you switch to lower-priced options in different colors, sizes, or sellers.
idea_7: This feature lets multiple users shop together by sharing carts, splitting payments, choosing addresses, chatting, setting deadlines, and applying discounts or combined shipping.
idea_8: This feature displays product specifications in a table and includes a fit checker that verifies compatibility using device scans, VIN input, or camera measurements.
idea_9: This feature allows users to update delivery location or time after dispatch, view live courier routes, see fees or credits, and combine multiple packages during delivery.
idea_10: This feature allows customers to reorder previous purchases and return items by scanning and dropping them off at specified locations for credit.

idea_1: This feature allows users to place items such as hats, glasses, bags, and decor on a mannequin or room canvas, customize colors and tones, and buy or find similar products.
idea_2: This feature allows users to rate fit and material, upload photos or short videos, uses AI to summarize reviews, and identifies conflicting feedback.
idea_3: This feature offers brief lessons on topics such as size charts, fabrics, and safety labels through quizzes. Completing lessons unlocks coupons and product recommendations.
idea_4: This feature lets children explore selected toys using mini-games and sticker wishlists, while parents review items and automatically manage family budgets.
idea_5: This feature is a clicker game featuring Temu items that offers time-limited discount bubbles and connects virtual decorations to actual product listings.
idea_6: This feature offers AR-guided DIY kits with tools and materials, provides step-by-step instructions, tracks progress, auto-reorders supplies, and enables sharing completed projects.
idea_7: This feature allows you to create a 24-hour A/B poll, gather votes from friends or the community, and start a group-buy with discounts if enough people participate.
idea_8: This feature organizes your orders into categories, stores related documents, and sends alerts for compatibility, refills, and item suggestions based on your purchase history.
idea_9: This feature allows you to search with phrases or lyrics to find related styles, then view and filter moodboards by color, style, price, and shipping speed.
idea_10: This feature allows you to create product bundles by choosing a base item, finishes, add-ons, and accessories with updated pricing. You can save, share, and swap items.

idea_1: This feature uses your camera to show a room with selected items in AR, adapts to your space, offers alternative options, and allows adding all items to your cart.
idea_2: This feature allows shoppers to set a desired price for an item, and if enough people choose the same price, Temu purchases the item at that price automatically.
idea_3: This feature shows a video of the item with size, color, and condition details before shipping, allowing buyers to approve or cancel the order for a refund.
idea_4: This feature allows nearby customers to combine their orders into one shared container, which is delivered to a locker or pickup point with delivery credits and scheduled times.
idea_5: This feature lets users combine items from different sellers into bundles, applies tiered discounts, and automatically replaces similar items to find the lowest price without altering chosen options.
idea_6: This feature allows shoppers to order two sizes or colors of clothing, keep the items that fit, return the rest with a prepaid pouch and QR locker, and collects fit data for future suggestions.
idea_7: This feature displays a time-limited buyback credit on eligible items at checkout, enabling customers to return the product for Temu credit or list it for resale.
idea_8: This feature allows buyers to join live factory sessions to choose finishes, engravings, or add-ons, with their selections saved and displayed on the order page.
idea_9: This feature provides customizable checklists, budget plans, delivery schedules, and assembly instructions to help users prepare for events like moving or having a new baby.
idea_10: This feature saves manuals, warranties, parts, and consumables for each order, sends reminders for refills, and enables one-tap reordering based on usage.

idea_1: This feature provides a subscription that unlocks 3D photo mode, special paint materials, global giveaways, pit-stop coupons, ad-free play, weekly time trials, and early car access.
idea_2: This feature records flips, wall rides, rooftop climbs, and trampoline jumps, uses physics-based multipliers, and lets players combine tricks to access parts and challenges.
idea_3: This feature lets you download mission playlists and city packs to play without internet. Your progress is saved and updated automatically when you go online.
idea_4: This feature lets players reserve trial cars at rental spots, follow routes with directions and refuel stops, and return cars by deadlines to earn rewards.
idea_5: This feature displays route distances, drift zones, and parking space sizes on a map, enables setting time trials by tapping, and allows users to share routes.
idea_6: This feature provides session timers, adjustable camera settings, color-safe presets, and a Junior Mode that limits speed, simplifies physics, and requires a parent PIN for purchases.
idea_7: This feature lets players test-drive cars, negotiate prices, finance purchases with in-game credit, track monthly payments, and complete tasks to unlock special models and race entries.
idea_8: This feature allows you to collect and equip mod cards for tires, aero, ECU, and nitro before events, with some arenas and duels restricting card usage.
idea_9: This feature records the last 30 to 120 seconds of gameplay, lets you save and edit clips, add voice or music, and share them using shortcuts.
idea_10: This feature lets users create custom mascots and decals, apply them to cars and banners, export images as PNG files, and use a photo booth with filters and effects.

idea_1: This feature adds city elements such as roadworks, accidents, events, and police checkpoints that change traffic routes, with AI drivers displaying different behaviors affecting traffic flow.
idea_2: This feature recommends sequences of jumps, drifts, and near-misses based on your car, shows a temporary route, scores your performance, and lets you share it as a challenge ghost.
idea_3: This feature adds tire heat, brake fade, and fluid temperature effects that affect vehicle handling, and provides quick-service bays for fast pit stops during free-roam sessions.
idea_4: This feature allows you to place a life-sized car in your room using AR, adjust its position, lights, and animations, and create custom designs with AI-generated textures.
idea_5: This feature lets players switch between roles such as driver, blocker, scout, or interceptor during events. Friends can send AI versions to join when they are offline.
idea_6: This feature adjusts the time and weather based on the player’s location or changing microclimates, updating grip, aerodynamics, and splash effects in real time.
idea_7: This feature lets users adjust vibration and sound settings for various road surfaces and share or download settings created by other users.
idea_8: This feature displays driving lines, braking points, and drift angles based on your data, provides real-time audio and vibration feedback, and uses ghost data for practice drills.
idea_9: This feature lets players create and share collections of tunes, liveries, stunt lines, and mini-missions that others can install with a single tap.
idea_10: This feature detects events such as near misses, long drifts, big jumps, and police escapes, then creates a vertical video highlight with music for export.

idea_1: This feature lets the shark jump out of the water and perform spins, rolls, and tail-slaps to earn combo points and remove obstacles for additional time and challenges.
idea_2: This feature allows players to save the last 20 seconds of gameplay with one tap, highlights important events, and provides a photo mode with camera controls and filters.
idea_3: This feature lets players play certain missions and mini-boss challenges offline, saving their progress and rewards to update when they reconnect to the internet.
idea_4: This feature tracks timed chomps and dashes to fill a meter that releases a sonic wave, attracting prey and stunning predators. It can use mic input for clapping or humming.
idea_5: This feature offers monthly access to new 3D skins, effects, rotating shark trials, and weekly giveaways, along with a countdown timer, billing reminders, cancel options, and family sharing.
idea_6: This feature allows you to test sharks in a restricted area, tracks upgrade costs alongside related missions, and lets you make partial payments to keep event discounts.
idea_7: This feature displays a sonar overlay that marks nearby objectives, measures distances to chests or bosses, highlights safe routes, and shows a path from your best run.
idea_8: This feature lets players customize sharks and baby companions with layers, shaders, and templates, and allows them to share or export their designs as PNG files.
idea_9: This feature allows you to create a Reef HQ by placing coral and devices that offer passive effects, attract prey, or open event portals. You can also raise pets with traits and send them on timed missions to gather materials.
idea_10: This feature allows players to collect Mutation Cards with various effects and build a deck before each run, influencing abilities available during gameplay.

idea_1: This feature adds weekly ocean events that modify zones with elements such as thermal vents, toxic spills, and algal blooms, impacting prey, hazards, and score multipliers.
idea_2: This feature lets players add augment chips to sharks to modify their main moves, combine bonuses from pets and gear, and use presets for various missions.
idea_3: This feature lets players share a recorded hunt route and prey setup for friends to try within 24 hours, with rewards given based on difficulty and modifiers.
idea_4: This feature lets players build an underwater base with collected materials, unlock bonuses, craft items, show trophies, and join timed defense events with leaderboards.
idea_5: This feature provides a timed mode where players choose one of three random mutations each minute, which accumulate during the run, and earn currency to unlock additional mutations.
idea_6: This feature enables prey and predators to detect light, sound, and scent changes, allows hiding in kelp or sand, and adds gadgets like noise-makers and ink clouds.
idea_7: This feature uses AR to place virtual items such as treasure crates, eggs, and event portals in your environment. Daily scans provide boost items and game updates.
idea_8: This feature allows players to participate in server-wide boss battles by damaging a shared health pool. Players can create clans to earn team bonuses and unlock boss-related items.
idea_9: This feature lets players combine duplicate pets to create hybrids with inherited traits, use an item to lock certain genes, and updates gene pools each season.
idea_10: This feature adjusts prey amounts and shop prices daily according to feeding and weather, encourages exploring areas, and provides contracts to restore zones and earn skins and boosters.

idea_1: This feature adds a Trick Chain meter that fills with accurate placements and consecutive clears, providing a one-cell nudge to adjust the last block when specific levels are reached.
idea_2: This feature allows players to copy the current board to a practice area, save move sequences as replays, and automatically record the last 20 seconds for review or sharing.
idea_3: This feature sets small goals for each run, displays their estimated time, difficulty, and rewards, and indicates when you can advance to the next difficulty level.
idea_4: This feature offers downloadable Commute Packs for 3–7 minutes of offline play, allows adjusting pieces, and automatically syncs progress when connected to the internet.
idea_5: This feature allows players to use coins to borrow a specific shape for up to three uses, then return it for a partial refund and a bonus if unused.
idea_6: This Feature provides a Precision Snap mode that suggests exact fits, highlights edges and gaps, previews collisions, and displays up to three landing spots when pressing and holding.
idea_7: This feature arranges challenges into episodes with short story parts and specific mechanics. Users can search by mechanic or difficulty and queue episodes to play continuously.
idea_8: This feature displays an overlay that calculates area coverage, counts gaps, estimates clearing potential for upcoming pieces, and allows simulating one move ahead and saving layouts.
idea_9: This feature allows players to create decks by choosing cards from rotating sets and play turn-based matches. It also displays seasonal stats about card combinations.
idea_10: This feature allows users to create a Block Buddy and customize its diorama by completing goals. The buddy displays animations based on streaks, and seasonal events add décor and 3D block skins.

idea_1: This feature provides a swap bank that stores one piece, which can be charged by completing combos or quests. Swapping pieces does not affect the upcoming queue.
idea_2: This feature adds Path Mode, where players connect marked targets with continuous block paths to clear them and score lines, without altering the main game rules.
idea_3: This feature tracks cleared lines with mostly one color to fill corresponding meters, allowing the player to select a special power-piece of that color when a meter is full.
idea_4: This feature adds weekly event boards with new elements such as ice tiles that need two clears, teleporting portals, and decaying blockers, with rules changing separately from the main mode.
idea_5: This feature allows two players to play the same game setup separately and compare their scores or last moves. Rematches use the same setup again.
idea_6: This feature displays a translucent replay of a previous run or top player on the current board. Tapping a step shows a heatmap and projected clears for that move.
idea_7: This feature sets small goals based on your draws. Completing a streak gives a one-time reward, like a free queue refresh.
idea_8: This feature displays three possible block placements with their expected clears, future fit scores, and risk of no moves to inform player decisions.
idea_9: This feature awards extra points for placing blocks on the beat, displays matching sounds and visuals, and lets players adjust the tempo.
idea_10: This feature lets users create puzzles with a starting board and piece sequence, share them, verify solvability, and view leaderboards for puzzle completion.

idea_1: This feature offers interactive exercises to help users recognize phishing, check app permissions, and practice safe browsing, using simulations and a progress score.
idea_2: This feature lets you connect with trusted contacts, share security settings, receive alerts about scams or breaches, and send device protection suggestions with permission.
idea_3: This feature allows you to create a custom scan by choosing options such as stalkerware check, tracker purge, and network audit, schedule it to run automatically, and view the results.
idea_4: This feature checks new apps, Wi-Fi connections, and unknown calls or texts by examining their source, certificates, reputation, and permissions, letting you block, allow, or select options.
idea_5: This feature sends alerts using voice prompts, vibrations, and high-contrast banners, and allows users to set quiet hours while prioritizing severe event notifications.
idea_6: This feature allows users to earn points by completing security tasks such as scans and reports, which can be redeemed for premium time, licenses, or donations.
idea_7: This feature detects screen overlays and fake input fields, offers a secure keypad for entering sensitive data, clears the clipboard automatically, blocks clipboard access, and alerts about keylogging apps.
idea_8: This feature provides a community-updated list of reported scams, malicious websites, and fake delivery messages, enabling users to block or filter them with a single tap.
idea_9: This feature displays malware and scam trends for your region, device, and apps, provides guidance to address them, and offers travel-related risk information with protection options.
idea_10: This feature lets you add optional modules for offline virus definitions, document scanning, QR code and short-link analysis, and cloud drive scanning to the app.

idea_1: This feature analyzes live call audio to detect AI-generated voices, provides an authenticity score, and lets users block, record, or report the call.
idea_2: This feature opens unknown links in a separate browser that blocks sensors, uses temporary cookies, limits clipboard access, filters threats via a local VPN, and clears data afterward.
idea_3: This feature detects hidden tracking apps, call or message forwarding, and location sharing without notifying others. It provides a hidden exit, removal instructions, and an optional report for authorities.
idea_4: This feature shows alerts when apps request sensitive permissions or start services, provides temporary and location-based permissions, detects permission changes after updates, and removes unused permissions.
idea_5: This feature monitors app network activity using a local VPN, blocks unusual data transfers, provides explanations for blocked actions, and lets you isolate the app if necessary.
idea_6: This feature monitors unusual file changes in shared storage, temporarily stops the app’s network access, backs up recent files to the cloud, and helps with file recovery.
idea_7: This feature scans QR codes and NFC tags for possible threats like unsafe websites or credential theft and displays a warning before opening them.
idea_8: This feature detects fake Wi-Fi networks by checking network information, switches to cellular or VPN-only mode automatically, and adds the hotspot to a shared threat map.
idea_9: This feature monitors SIM and carrier changes, detects service interruptions and port-out alerts, locks apps with OTPs, hides related notifications, and provides instructions to contact your carrier.
idea_10: This feature temporarily hides selected apps and data, reduces notifications and background activity, and enforces stricter network and location settings when activated with a decoy PIN.

idea_1: This feature uses AI roleplay to help you practice dating profiles, conversation starters, and chat skills through daily exercises, with optional feedback from friends.
idea_2: This feature lets trusted friends leave private recommendations and introduction notes, and shows a referral tree indicating who invited each person without sharing contact information.
idea_3: This feature provides chat icebreakers such as mini-games, photo prompts, and music matching to help users interact and earn tokens for rewards or donations.
idea_4: This feature lets users share temporary phone numbers with one tap and arrange calls or video meetings, with numbers expiring automatically or when the session ends.
idea_5: This feature lets users privately share feedback about their date, such as punctuality, conversation, and safety, to help improve future matches and provide guidance.
idea_6: This feature recommends meeting locations based on users’ locations, travel times, and weather, sends severe weather alerts, and suggests indoor options when needed.
idea_7: This feature allows users to set adjustable filters with strict or flexible options, view live match counts, and share their filter settings using QR codes at events.
idea_8: This feature allows users to reserve a table with two selected drinks or snacks, offers contactless check-in at partner locations, and includes dietary information and item swaps.
idea_9: This feature offers live captions for voice notes and video chats, controls for noise reduction and voice clarity, and profile badges showing accessibility preferences.
idea_10: This feature offers local prompts where users can comment to join matching groups, with moderation and content filters to ensure a safe and appropriate environment.

idea_1: This feature allows users to choose a vibe, budget, and time to get three date plans with venue, activity, travel details, booking, and calendar options.
idea_2: This feature allows you and a potential match to each ask one question and submit answers, which are shown to both only after both have replied.
idea_3: This feature allows users to add cards to their profiles indicating communication speed, first-date preferences, and physical boundaries. It also provides check-ins and consent prompts during chats.
idea_4: This feature allows you to share your travel dates and locations, find others traveling at the same time, and receive suggestions for meeting places and plans.
idea_5: This feature lets a verified friend join a 10-minute read-only group chat after a match to help start the conversation. Access ends automatically afterward.
idea_6: This feature allows users to check into a location, view other users checked in there, and send a wave to start a chat if both users agree.
idea_7: This feature displays a meter that tracks conversation balance, offers prompts to keep the chat going, and lets users set an auto-status to schedule follow-up messages.
idea_8: This feature allows users to play short cooperative mini-games together, generating shared content that is automatically added as prompts within their chat conversations.
idea_9: This feature offers a private summary after a date about comfort, enjoyment, and intentions, includes a safe‑home check, and suggests next steps or a closure message.
idea_10: This feature lets two compatible couples connect for group activities by providing group chat, scheduling polls, and access to optional discounts.

idea_1: This feature provides daily timed challenges with prompts for various skills, tracks progress streaks, and lets users tag posts to receive feedback and support.
idea_2: This feature improves audio clarity in videos and voice notes, reduces background noise, and generates captions that sync with your earbuds or speakers.
idea_3: This feature allows users to ask others for brief reviews and ratings on their threads, then creates a summary card that shows the collected feedback.
idea_4: This feature displays posts and profiles from people nearby, enables temporary event threads with RSVP options, and provides safety tips along with location privacy settings.
idea_5: This feature allows you to organize posts into lists, download them for offline use or text-to-speech playback, and refreshes the lists when you reconnect.
idea_6: This feature allows users to earn rewards by providing helpful replies, creating curated lists, and completing community tasks, which can be exchanged for creator boosts, tips, or gift cards.
idea_7: This feature shows local weather forecasts on posts with location tags and highlights severe weather alerts. Users can follow events to get updates in their feed.
idea_8: This feature allows users to add small apps to threads, including polls, menus, price trackers, maps, reply filters, and QR or join codes from a verified catalog.
idea_9: This feature lets users merge multiple posts into a single thread with side-by-side panels, draggable content pieces, and automatic credit to the original posts.
idea_10: This feature ranks new creators and topics in specific micro-genres by engagement quality. Users can subscribe to get weekly updates and personalized content suggestions.

idea_1: This feature creates an AI summary of long conversations, showing main points, opinions, and open questions, and lets users quickly find important replies or followed users.
idea_2: This feature lets up to four accounts manage a thread together by posting, moderating, pinning updates, and displaying a combined timeline to followers.
idea_3: This feature adds a small context card when quoting or screenshotting, showing the original source, key previous posts, and edit history, with an option to view the full conversation timeline.
idea_4: This feature creates an event thread where attendees can check in by location, receive badges and posting priority, show verified updates to others, and publish a recap after the event.
idea_5: This feature allows users to organize posts into Collections with an introduction and optional table of contents, and lets followers subscribe to receive updates from them.
idea_6: This feature sorts replies into categories such as question, insight, critique, and humor, lets users filter or hide categories, and allows hosts to set rules and pin highlights.
idea_7: This feature provides creators with a weekly Boost token to highlight a smaller account’s post for 48 hours; boosted posts are labeled and searchable by “boosted by” filters.
idea_8: This feature turns a thread into a vertical video with captions, visuals, and voiceover, enabling users to share it as a Reel or Story connected to the original post.
idea_9: This feature allows users to add locations to posts and see a live map of nearby conversations, tips, and events, with settings for location accuracy and visibility.
idea_10: This feature lets users create multi-part threads with scheduled posts, automatic links between parts, a table of contents, a recap card, time zone scheduling, and batch editing.

idea_1: This feature counts consecutive correct words to raise a multiplier and unlock special tiles that let players jump over blocked cells. Some word patterns activate bonus jumps.
idea_2: This feature allows you to save limited-time coupons for hints, coins, and boosters, which are automatically applied during purchases. Coupons can be earned through daily streaks or partner offers.
idea_3: This feature adds a fish, artifact, or plant to a customizable Wonderarium after each puzzle. It also gives coins, hints, and seasonal decorations during idle time.
idea_4: This feature lets users spell words aloud letter-by-letter or completely using voice input, compares their pronunciation to native audio, and awards badges based on accuracy.
idea_5: This feature offers a step-by-step checklist that teaches word strategies, unlocks advanced modes through short tests, and rewards progress with stamps, boosters, and new levels.
idea_6: This feature displays a world map with distances between wonders, organizes puzzles by location, enables seat reservations for co-op tours, and sends opening reminders.
idea_7: This feature allows players to download full country packs with images, music, and puzzles for offline play. Progress syncs automatically when online, and storage warnings are shown.
idea_8: This feature uses the camera to capture letters from signs or books, turns them into wildcard tiles or hint shards, and creates a postcard with the photo and solved word to share.
idea_9: This feature provides an optional Scrabble-style mode with letter scores and special squares on a small board, supporting solo or head-to-head play with timed rounds and tile management.
idea_10: This feature lets clubs design logos with shapes, fonts, and icons, use them on leaderboards and events, and unlock decorative frames by completing tournaments and achievements.

idea_1: This feature allows you to choose a topic, then provides puzzles with related words. Completing puzzles fills a passport page with facts and gives a reward.
idea_2: This feature lets two players work on the same puzzle at the same time, share hints, take turns entering words, and earn combo multipliers and bonuses.
idea_3: This feature displays each wonder as a 3D model using AR while you play. Tapping points on the model reveals facts and awards coins.
idea_4: This feature lets users enter words by speaking, provides fonts and colors suitable for dyslexia and colorblindness, and offers tappable audio definitions as hints.
idea_5: This feature lets players enter a theme and word list, generates a crossword puzzle, verifies its content, and shares it on a public feed.
idea_6: This feature changes puzzle difficulty by adjusting board density, letter frequency, and word length based on your skill, and offers weekly challenges with cosmetic rewards.
idea_7: This feature splits a large puzzle into parts for team play with specific roles and bonuses. Completing all parts unlocks an animated wonder and a clan trophy.
idea_8: This feature generates a puzzle from a photo by detecting objects or text as starting words and matching background colors for others to play the custom puzzle.
idea_9: This feature allows players 60 seconds to resume their daily streak after missing a day, with the challenge changing according to the streak length.
idea_10: This feature adds a mode where each new word changes one letter from the previous word toward a target word, unlocking photo tiles and special letters when completed.

idea_1: This feature allows you to split songs or podcasts into labeled sections, loop parts, set skip points, combine segments into a continuous mix, and share the mix details.
idea_2: This feature allows you to explore music and podcasts by gradually changing genres, time periods, and regions from your current track, with options to follow trends and control exploration speed.
idea_3: This feature allows you to save unavailable songs to a wishlist that updates when they become available, import local music files with metadata, and combine them with streaming content.
idea_4: This feature automatically downloads chosen songs or podcasts when the connection is weak, controls download quality and storage, displays progress, and deletes files after use.
idea_5: This feature displays nearby places with their playlists and events, allows ticket purchases and provides directions, and lets you view local music activity anonymously.
idea_6: This feature saves selected songs and podcasts offline with compression and preloaded intros, automatically updating content while using minimal data for playback without internet.
idea_7: This feature translates podcasts and artist commentary into multiple languages with synced captions, provides a bilingual mode for alternating languages, and auto-translates chapter titles, notes, and links.
idea_8: This feature allows you to separate vocals or instruments, adjust playback speed, monitor pitch and rhythm, follow exercises, and record duets within the app.
idea_9: This Feature creates an audio profile for each ear, adjusts sound clarity and volume according to earbuds and background noise, and lets users turn enhancements on or off for playlists.
idea_10: This feature allows you to organize playlists by criteria such as mood, BPM, or era, update them automatically, combine playlists, remove duplicates, pin offline versions, and manage settings.

idea_1: This feature plays songs with short informational blurbs about artists, samples, and chart history, lets you adjust blurb frequency, and access related podcast or audiobook clips without interrupting playback.
idea_2: This feature displays chapter cards for podcasts with mentioned products, books, venues, and links. Users can save items to a Wish List and get price-drop alerts.
idea_3: This feature moves the song or podcast you are playing to the nearest device, such as a phone or Echo, using Bluetooth or ultrasound without opening the app.
idea_4: This feature adjusts the tempo of songs to match your running or cycling pace without altering the pitch and changes the playlist according to your energy levels.
idea_5: This feature lets family members add songs, short voice notes, and emojis to a shared playlist that resets daily, with weekly summaries created automatically.
idea_6: This feature plays short news, weather updates, calendar reminders, and podcast clips between songs during your commute, timed to your estimated arrival, with voice controls.
idea_7: This feature scans your ears and room to create a sound profile that adjusts audio settings for clearer sound, consistent volume, and balanced equalization on headphones and speakers.
idea_8: This feature provides behind-the-scenes videos, Q&A sessions, polls, and merchandise options related to an artist while their music is playing.
idea_9: This feature displays a tile linking songs or podcast episodes to related Audible books, letting users sample and add them to a shared queue with synced progress across apps.
idea_10: This feature creates a downloadable playlist of songs and podcast episodes from a chosen time period and can update the playlist automatically every night.

idea_1: This feature offers short lessons and practice calls or messages to help users identify scam patterns and adjust call-screen prompts according to their progress.
idea_2: This feature allows users to create private groups to share verified phone numbers, labels, and safe lists that show on caller ID, with invitations sent by link or QR code.
idea_3: This feature adds a reviews tab for phone numbers with categories such as service, delivery, support, and scam, enabling users to add evidence and vote on review usefulness.
idea_4: This feature allows users to earn points by reporting spam, writing reviews, and completing challenges. Points can be exchanged for rewards, and contributions are checked for accuracy.
idea_5: This feature plays a menu for unknown callers, asks them to state their purpose or enter a code, then transcribes and summarizes their response before connecting the call.
idea_6: This feature shows live captions during call screening and transcribes voicemails instantly, highlighting key phrases. It processes data on the device and works with earbuds for private reading.
idea_7: This feature shows a 12-month history of blocked spam, identified callers, avoided risks, update notes, and a personal reliability score for monitoring.
idea_8: This feature displays a live list of scam numbers and methods with severity ratings, allows users to follow topics, and sends alerts about nearby scams.
idea_9: This feature automatically updates spam lists, caller-name formats, and languages based on your location, downloads offline protection, and displays spam peak times and common scams.
idea_10: This feature allows you to set rules to handle calls and messages, use templates, and check phone numbers for risk, history, and verification before contacting.

idea_1: This feature automatically contacts unknown numbers by call or SMS, asks them to choose a reason or record a message, and displays their response for managing calls.
idea_2: This feature listens to your voice call, detects potential scam phrases, displays them as live captions, and provides options to hang up or reply safely.
idea_3: This feature checks a one-time code and caller ID against a brand’s registry and notifies users if there is a mismatch or potential risk.
idea_4: This feature uses your address book to show how many contacts have saved, answered, or blocked a number, with all data processed privately on your device.
idea_5: This feature displays a timeline of a number’s behavior changes, including region and category details, and can automatically block numbers that rapidly increase in risk.
idea_6: This feature gives you temporary alias numbers with set usage times, message limits, automatic replies, and expiration to help keep your main number private.
idea_7: This feature displays tags, verified badges, and message history for unknown numbers from WhatsApp, Telegram, and SMS, and lets users block or verify them across all platforms with one tap.
idea_8: This feature checks breach data and public sources for your number and aliases, displays where they were found, suggests actions, and can close or reroute exposed aliases automatically.
idea_9: This feature lets users submit regulator complaints with pre-filled information, and allows businesses to claim numbers, add call reasons, and monitor complaint rates via a portal.
idea_10: This feature restricts incoming calls to approved contacts, asks unknown callers to verify their identity, and notifies caregivers who can manage allowed contacts remotely.

idea_1: This feature adds cliff-jumps, wall-bounces, and trampoline pads that units automatically use when directed through them, allowing combos that cause evasion or stun effects and unlock cosmetics.
idea_2: This feature lets players choose up to three war coupons before a match to reduce unit costs, unlock one free technology, or temporarily increase production speed.
idea_3: This feature lets players reserve one-time mercenary squads from various world-map locations and set their arrival time. Squad availability and prices vary by location.
idea_4: This feature records your battle actions with one tap and creates a short replay. You can practice against it or share a code for others to view.
idea_5: This feature allows you to record short claps or hums to create rhythmic war drums that play during attacks. Staying on beat provides small morale and speed boosts. Drum sets can be saved for each army in a rehearsal room.
idea_6: This feature gives build order suggestions before battle based on budget and timing, displays affordability and power spikes, and provides a checklist to follow during play.
idea_7: This feature shows projectile paths, spear charge range, splash areas, safe repair zones, march time, and miner gold rate to help with tactical planning.
idea_8: This feature lets users create clan banners and unit shield decals using preset images, apply them to flags, and share their designs with other players.
idea_9: This feature allows players to build a deck of 8 cards that trigger single-use effects like fog or healing during battles, with usage limits and cooldown periods.
idea_10: This feature presents bosses with changing abilities across waves, requiring strategy adjustments. Progressing unlocks a Titan unit usable in Campaign and Classic modes.

idea_1: This feature allows you to choose a Commander before battle who gives a passive team bonus and a chargeable ultimate ability that can be upgraded by leveling up.
idea_2: This feature allows players to activate temporary buffs by having specific units fight together. Players can choose one or two synergies per match from a synergy tree.
idea_3: This feature lets players add attachments like a ballista turret, regeneration aura, mana capacitor, or emergency shield to the Statue, changing its defense and gameplay effects.
idea_4: This feature lets players select and ban units or spells from a changing pool, create a battle plan, and compete in seasonal ladders with asynchronous, replayable matches.
idea_5: This feature lets users create basic if/then rules to control units, manage economy, targeting, formations, and abilities, and share, rate, or copy scripts.
idea_6: This feature adds a Relic Run mode where players select one of three artifacts after each win, which influence units or economy, with rising difficulty and permanent death.
idea_7: This feature lets clans battle multi-phase bosses with combined health, using assigned roles to complete raids and earn relic shards, skins, and emotes.
idea_8: This feature lets users design scenarios by adding terrain, mines, fog zones, and enemy waves with set conditions, then share them through a short code.
idea_9: This feature introduces battlefield events like escorting a gold caravan, capturing a hill that increases ranged unit strength, and rescuing prisoners to obtain free miners.
idea_10: This feature lets players record and watch game replays with timeline controls, bookmarks, camera options, and an optional AR viewer for sharing video clips.

idea_1: This feature offers guided exercises on beginner canvases, uses AI to adjust difficulty, tracks progress with a confidence score, and recommends practice pieces.
idea_2: This feature lets you sort painting sections by estimated completion time, download them for offline use, and automatically open the next section in order.
idea_3: This feature sends alerts about limited-time packs, expiring streaks, collaboration mural phases, and followed themes, providing countdowns and progress updates to track completion.
idea_4: This feature offers short coloring canvases lasting 1–3 minutes, includes gentle vibrations and soft sounds, and allows automatic progression to the next number for continuous coloring.
idea_5: This feature offers kid-friendly packs, offline play, parental controls, voice-based color selection, high-contrast overlays, and haptic feedback to support accessibility and family use.
idea_6: This feature converts photos into paint-by-number images, lets users adjust palette size, smooth edges, choose styles, and download multiple images for offline use.
idea_7: This feature lets users filter images by palette mood, completion time, color count, and theme, save filter settings, use distraction-free mode, and scan QR codes for extra content.
idea_8: This feature allows users to apply community-created palette themes, textures, frames, and seasonal pet skins with minor in-game effects to their completed artwork.
idea_9: This feature lets multiple users color numbered tiles in steps, tracks team progress, and assigns specific tiles to different users to complete large images collaboratively.
idea_10: This feature converts completed paintings into points that unlock donations to charities, displays global progress bars, and awards tokens redeemable for premium packs or gift cards.

idea_1: This feature allows users to create different color versions of a finished painting, save them for comparison, and apply a selected color palette to multiple images.
idea_2: This feature lets up to four users color simultaneously, assigning number ranges, showing live progress, and providing team bonuses for clean edges and synchronized finishing.
idea_3: This feature places a life-size canvas on a surface using AR, enables coloring by tapping on it, and allows users to save and share the completed artwork.
idea_4: This feature breaks animated scenes into individual frames, allows coloring each frame separately, creates a looping GIF or Live Photo when finished, and awards bonuses for using consistent colors.
idea_5: This feature converts photos into paint-by-number templates with options to adjust detail and smoothing, and enables users to share designs in a marketplace to earn coins or revenue.
idea_6: This feature lowers visual brightness and fades numbers when tapping slows, offers breathing prompts, tracks calm-time streaks, and provides quiet achievements instead of scores.
idea_7: This feature connects colors to sounds, producing music when tapped, and enables exporting the finished work as a short audio-visual clip.
idea_8: This feature lets you long-press to fill connected areas with the correct number, prevents color from spreading near edges, and double-tap to fill small missed cells.
idea_9: This feature allows you to speak a number to find its location in the image, highlighting the area with pulses and optional high-contrast overlays for coloring.
idea_10: This feature turns finished images into seeds that grow a garden with plants matching your colors. Coloring daily adds plants and unlocks backgrounds and sounds.

idea_1: This feature adds a Jungle Bazaar where players can purchase coin packs, Relic Crates with items, skins, or side levels, and limited-time bundles with extras like boss hints or extra hearts.
idea_2: This feature hides letter tiles on branches that form words to open doors. A daily mode scrambles letters in a mini-maze for extra coins and a leaderboard.
idea_3: This feature provides a VIP membership that removes ads, grants early access to micro-worlds, adds a golden badge, gives monthly rewards, and includes an extra pet slot.
idea_4: This feature adds a Style Studio where players can collect and use skins, emotes, and glow-trail effects earned during play to customize their character’s appearance.
idea_5: This feature includes small challenge rooms that test memory, pathfinding, and timed switches. Completing weekly sets rewards Mind Seeds, which can be used for hints, revives, or cosmetics.
idea_6: This feature allows players to control a beetle to activate switches, distract enemies, and carry coins across gaps. Upgrades add a honk and wings for additional actions.
idea_7: This feature allows players to decorate a Treehouse Camp using furniture collected in levels or events, unlock passive bonuses, and join weekly design challenges and coin exchanges.
idea_8: This feature adds short sprint tracks with hurdles and star targets for 30–60 second runs, enabling races against friend ghosts or 3v3 relay runs with teammates.
idea_9: This feature adds the Tower of Vines, a set of short tile levels with varying conditions, new enemies, ranking rewards, and difficulty that changes based on player performance.
idea_10: This feature automatically records short gameplay clips, lets players add filters and voiceovers, includes a Kidsafe mode to keep clips offline and disable the microphone, and offers a daily challenge schedule with options to skip or postpone tasks.

idea_1: This feature lets you race against your previous best time or top global players by downloading ghost data and earn rewards for completing time targets.
idea_2: This feature changes the game's weather and time, altering physics such as slippery vines and longer jumps, and reveals new platforms at night. It can be disabled in practice mode.
idea_3: This feature lets players create hybrid power-ups with limited uses by combining items through experimentation or by finding recipes in hidden rooms.
idea_4: This feature allows you to rescue and choose companion animals with upgradeable abilities, use one per level, and unlock special quests to obtain new skins.
idea_5: This feature provides an endless mode with random segments, allowing players to collect relics that affect gameplay and compete on a weekly leaderboard using a fixed seed.
idea_6: This feature lets users create levels using drag-and-drop tools with templates and enemy limits, share levels with codes, browse by difficulty, and earn badges for popular stages.
idea_7: This feature provides weekly boss challenges with varying conditions such as mirrored arenas, small platforms, or increased speed. Players can unlock cosmetics and emotes by achieving score targets.
idea_8: This feature provides optional alternate paths with obstacles synchronized to the music. Players can time their actions to receive speed boosts and increased coin rewards, supported by visual and vibration signals.
idea_9: This feature allows one-handed swipe control, customizable buttons, colorblind-friendly cues, adjustable game speed, and a practice mode that turns off leaderboards and achievements.
idea_10: This feature allows players to collect map fragments to unlock hidden islands with mini-biomes and event characters. Players can also trade duplicate power-ups for temporary boosts and access limited-time challenges.

idea_1: This feature adds trampolines, cliffs, and aerial rings where timed taps trigger jump actions that increase combo multipliers, create extra stickmen, or grant temporary invulnerability.
idea_2: This feature displays upcoming gates and hazards before a run, shows which paths are accessible based on your current count, and lists available optional bonuses.
idea_3: This feature records the last 15 seconds of gameplay, enables sharing of the clip, and generates a ghost crowd for competing with friends or other players.
idea_4: This feature lets players rent mounts, mechs, or shields for one run at kiosks on the world map, with available items varying by location.
idea_5: This feature lets players unlock 3D gliders and trail effects for their characters and join weekly giveaways and optional monthly events to get cosmetic items.
idea_6: This feature displays an overlay that tracks crowd changes at gates, measures trap areas, and simulates routes to assist in selecting different paths.
idea_7: This feature lets users create and customize leader and squad appearances, design clan banners by combining or uploading emblems, and show them on flags and statues.
idea_8: This feature lets players build a small deck of power-up cards and draw a limited number of them to use at certain points during the game.
idea_9: This feature lets players place gates, traps, and bounce pads using snap-to-grid alignment and share codes to create and share challenge playlists.
idea_10: This feature adds letter and symbol locks during runs that require solving mini-cryptograms to open lanes with higher multipliers, with errors causing loss of stickmen or time.

idea_1: This feature lets players change crowd formations with two-finger gestures, influencing stickmen movement and hazard interaction. Formations consume stamina that recharges over time.
idea_2: This feature adds bosses with number-locked shields that open when your crowd meets certain number conditions, and temporary gates appear to change your count during the fight.
idea_3: This feature lets players assign role kits to some stickmen, turning them into Specialists with abilities such as blocking traps or building bridges, which use units.
idea_4: This feature allows you to place gates and traps on a mirrored version of opponents' courses, watch replays, earn trophies, and modify your setup.
idea_5: This feature lets two players run together in real time, merge their crowds to fight a boss, control their characters jointly, and share rewards according to their efforts.
idea_6: This feature lets players solve a math puzzle to unlock and change the next gate set once per section. Skipping or failing keeps the original path.
idea_7: This feature adds breakable objects such as cages and barricades that release neutral stickmen or Giants when destroyed, giving players the option to break or avoid them.
idea_8: This feature lets players select and use one single-use gadget, such as Inflatable Bridge, Gate Rerouter, or Tax Shield, before each run to influence gameplay.
idea_9: This feature adds short events that temporarily change game rules, include separate leaderboards, and offer missions that provide themed cosmetic items as rewards.
idea_10: This feature lets users create and share short puzzle lanes with set goals, verifies their completion, and enables players to compete using share codes and leaderboards.

idea_1: This feature offers step-by-step lessons on pixel shading, anti-aliasing, and palette use, tracks progress, identifies errors, and adjusts exercises accordingly.
idea_2: This feature sends notifications about new or limited canvases, displays popular themes locally and globally, and recommends an offline coloring pack during severe weather or low battery.
idea_3: This feature provides collectible fish and decorations for a pixel aquarium that animates with sounds and light effects during breaks between sessions.
idea_4: This feature creates an offline list of canvases based on your travel time and connection, automatically downloading them and recommending short projects for brief waiting periods.
idea_5: This feature lets users filter images by time, color count, style, and eye-strain level, save or share filters as QR codes, and adjust color visibility options.
idea_6: This feature offers themed coloring packs with voice instructions, large color areas, simple palettes, content controls, session timers, and the ability to download content for offline use.
idea_7: This feature lets users rate packs, leave feedback, vote on upcoming topics, view creator updates, and see verification badges and friend recommendations for creators.
idea_8: This feature lets you import images and turn them into numbered pixel art canvases that can be saved offline or shared in a moderated gallery.
idea_9: This feature applies visual effects like glitter, glitch, glaze, and glimmer to colored images and allows exporting them as looping videos or live wallpapers that respond to music.
idea_10: This feature records points from streaks, challenges, and reviews, which users can exchange for premium packs, palettes, coupons, gift-card raffles, and an ad-free experience.

idea_1: This feature highlights large connected sections to suggest the order for filling areas, reduces color changes, and automatically moves to the next section when finished.
idea_2: This feature turns photos into pixel art by applying style presets and adjusting color palette size and detail with a difficulty slider to create coloring templates.
idea_3: This feature assigns each player a tile in timed events to complete a large mosaic. Completed tiles are marked, and badges display the group's progress.
idea_4: This feature shows color-number symbols, allows contrast adjustment, provides different haptic feedback for each color, reads colors aloud on tap, and offers a colorblind preview with palette options.
idea_5: This feature displays finished pixel art on real-world surfaces with correct pixel size and lets users set up location-based mini-exhibitions for others to see nearby.
idea_6: This feature plays sounds and vibrations that align with your breathing and coloring pace. It also records your calm times and weekly usage.
idea_7: This feature uncovers hidden parts of a map as nearby areas are completed, sometimes revealing secret colors, and provides tools like Scanline and Spotlight to help with gameplay.
idea_8: This feature lets users change colors in finished artwork using collectible palettes. Users can earn, create, and trade palettes, and unlocking sets reveals new artworks.
idea_9: This feature lets users create templates from images or from scratch, adjust remix options, monitor usage, and earn rewards when others color their designs.
idea_10: This feature records time-lapse videos of your coloring with music, displays statistics such as taps and time, and lets you share the videos with optional watermark settings.

idea_1: This feature introduces boards with trampoline tiles and obstacles that enable tokens to jump over blocks or capture multiple tokens. Time-limited challenges offer bonus coins during matches.
idea_2: This feature matches players by skill, coins, and availability, suggests appropriate tournament brackets, and shows an entry checklist with the number of available seats.
idea_3: This feature records important moments in a match, generates a 15–30 second highlight video, and lets users add voice-over or captions for sharing.
idea_4: This feature lets users reserve private tables in advance, invite friends automatically, choose a server region, and displays a Clean Play badge after fairness checks.
idea_5: This feature lets players collect digital coupons and automatically use discounts on entry fees, cosmetics, or re-roll tokens, with time-limited bundles displayed at checkout.
idea_6: This feature shows the chances of capturing opponents and the estimated number of turns to reach home. It can be enabled or disabled depending on the game mode.
