idea_4: This feature lets two players play together on one bingo card in real time, each controlling half and sharing power-ups, with rewards split between them.
idea_5: This feature provides changing bounty numbers that give a global bonus to players who complete a bingo with those numbers marked within one hour.
idea_6: This feature offers a 3-second mini-game before each round that lets players activate one perk, like rerolling a column, protecting a mis-daub, or charging a powerup.
idea_7: This feature uses the camera to identify basic colors or shapes, then adds a daily charm that changes one inactive number into a wildcard for the next game.
idea_8: This feature lets players join side pools that contribute to live microjackpots for specific mini-goals, with winners announced to everyone in the game room.
idea_9: This feature lets players exchange an inactive bingo card after a set number of calls or get a bonus like double marks on the next two numbers.
idea_10: This feature allows players to create custom bingo patterns, join temporary community rooms, receive likes and small rewards for patterns, with weekly updates and moderation.

idea_1: This feature offers practice lessons and simulated budgets to help users manage bill payments, saving, or Credit Builder, providing feedback and automation recommendations.
idea_2: This feature allows you to invite a money buddy to share certain progress details or connect with a verified peer to track financial goals together.
idea_3: This feature awards tickets for actions like on-time deposits, roundups, and quizzes. Tickets enter weekly drawings for cash or APY boosts and can be donated.
idea_4: This Feature allows you to create budget categories, set spending limits, split paychecks, and use rules that adjust spending based on merchant types.
idea_5: This feature allows you to label and rate transactions, attach photo receipts, report problems, block merchants, and set spending limits for individual merchants.
idea_6: This feature gives kids and teens a parent-controlled card, tracks chores, automates allowance payments, sets savings goals, and includes avatars with leaderboards that hide account balances.
idea_7: This feature estimates your income and bills for the next 30 to 90 days, identifies weeks with low balances, and allows you to adjust transfers or move money accordingly.
idea_8: This feature allows you to set your card to lock and unlock automatically at specific times, based on location, merchant type, amount, and provides vibration and sound alerts.
idea_9: This feature generates virtual debit numbers for trials and subscriptions, monitors renewal dates, sends alerts before charges, and pauses the card if a charge is declined.
idea_10: This feature lets you create payment links, invoices, and QR codes to receive payments, set aside money for taxes and savings, and track 1099 income with export options.

idea_1: This feature covers shortfalls on selected bills with a temporary advance and repays the amount from the next deposit according to user-set limits and preferences.
idea_2: This feature divides each paycheck into bills, savings, goals, and spending according to due dates and cash flow, allowing users to adjust or pause the allocations.
idea_3: This feature offers virtual trial cards that expire automatically, identifies subscriptions, enables cancellations within the app, and shows upcoming charges on a daily renewal heat map.
idea_4: This feature scans receipts and emails to find items, warranties, and return dates, sends reminders before deadlines, detects price changes, and assists with refund requests.
idea_5: This feature allows users to form savings groups, set up automatic contributions and payouts, monitor member participation, and maintain a shared reserve for missed payments.
idea_6: This feature reports on-time rent, utilities, and recurring payments made through Chime to credit bureaus, displays estimated credit score changes, and notifies you of missing tradelines.
idea_7: This feature tracks gig income, estimates payout dates, automatically sets aside taxes, and offers reminders and exportable records for 1099 tax filing.
idea_8: This feature allows you to set spending limits by country, block specific merchants, locate fee-free ATMs, and receive real-time currency conversion alerts while traveling.
idea_9: This feature allows users to set spending limits or block transactions by merchant, category, amount, or time, with an option to unlock temporarily for 30 minutes.
idea_10: This feature allows you to plan your cash flow for the next 90 days by adjusting payments, savings, or cancellations, and then sets up transfers based on those changes.

idea_1: This feature adds EVA parkour arenas where players use thrusters, wall runs, and repulsor bounces to perform combos, earn score multipliers, and view suit animations and leaderboards.
idea_2: This feature allows players to collect time-limited vouchers from station bulletins for salvage, docking fee discounts, and crafting rebates, which can be used during refuel, cargo checkout, or builds.
idea_3: This feature allows players to record short voice notes that are converted to text and linked to ships, modules, or map locations. Notes can be shared or exported.
idea_4: This feature allows players to add small asteroids and glowing creatures that make sounds in a zero-gravity space, enabling interaction and slow-motion effects during idle play.
idea_5: This feature lets users rent ships, rovers, and lab modules from orbital branches, displaying availability, repair status, deposit details, return instructions, and autopilot guidance.
idea_6: This feature offers in-game credit and resource loans for large builds, includes monthly repayment plans based on production, and provides a checklist to guide users through the process.
idea_7: This feature lets users measure distances, areas, and volumes on asteroids and stations, draw zones for calculations, save and label measurements, and align them to map grids.
idea_8: This Feature allows players to download game areas, storylets, and challenges to play without internet. Progress is saved and updated when connected again.
idea_9: This feature provides collectible blueprint cards for modules, maneuvers, and perks. Players create decks to configure ship loadouts and base options, and can combine cards to improve abilities.
idea_10: This feature lets users create layered emblems for mission patches, ship logos, and mascots, export them as decals, share templates with squads, and join design contests.

idea_1: This feature allows you to draw orbital transfer paths by touch, calculates burn times, and automatically manages spacecraft staging and timewarp settings.
idea_2: This feature lets users create planets by adjusting DNA and atmosphere settings, simulate life evolution, speed up time, gather materials, and export genetic codes.
idea_3: This feature allows users to add stations and artifacts to a shared constellation over time, combines all changes, and generates a timelapse showing all contributions.
idea_4: This feature allows you to recruit NPC crew members with upgradable traits who perform tasks such as mining, docking, or farming. You can control them using voice or tap commands and set their work schedules.
idea_5: This feature lets users share blueprints with adjustable cargo, thrust, and habitat volume sliders, automatically routes power and fluids, and runs preflight checks.
idea_6: This feature allows users to set design goals such as payload mass, delta-v, budget, and docking size. It recommends parts, adjusts engines, staging, and power, and displays trade-offs.
idea_7: This feature displays your star system in AR on a table, allows moving stations, zooming, placing structures on surfaces, and sharing the scene with nearby players.
idea_8: This feature generates events such as anomalies, contracts, derelicts, and disasters based on your technology. Your choices influence the economy, ecology, and politics in saved systems.
idea_9: This feature records mission data with visual overlays like thrust vectors and heat maps, enables replaying, and allows users to share clips for annotation by others.
idea_10: This feature allows you to start space missions that continue when you are offline. You receive notifications about events and can join to make decisions.

idea_1: This feature allows units to use momentum to vault over cliffs or obstacles, activating temporary speed and damage effects when performed correctly and unlocking new movement options.
idea_2: This feature lets players create marches with several stops and set arrival times. Alliance leaders can share routes for members to follow automatically.
idea_3: This feature lets users record voice notes attached to map markers, which are transcribed and translated automatically. Allies can listen to them with timestamps while moving.
idea_4: This Feature evaluates your city’s progress toward milestones, predicts resource and building needs, estimates completion times, and generates a checklist with trade and donation goals.
idea_5: This feature lets users measure distance, area, tower coverage, and safety zones by dragging, view unit ETAs between points, and share saved measurements as alliance orders.
idea_6: This feature offers a downloadable Commute Mode with offline PvE activities like skirmishes, chores, and puzzle raids, enabling local action queuing and reward syncing upon reconnection.
idea_7: This feature lets players choose a set of tactical runes with limited uses before a battle. The number of runes available changes depending on the game mode.
idea_8: This feature offers a build mode with snap-to-grid, transparent blueprint previews, spacing guides, and a one-tap function to suggest layout arrangements for structures.
idea_9: This feature lets clans create and customize a sigil and sail using Viking symbols, colors, and mascots, with options to export PNG files and use preset alliance ranks.
idea_10: This feature displays war replays, campaign episodes, and creator guides, allows instant clipping and voice-over remixing, and shares timecoded clips directly in alliance chat.

idea_1: This feature lets leaders draw on the world map, set rally timers, assign roles, convert time zones, and send alerts with pings and voice messages.
idea_2: This feature changes weather and seasons, affecting movement, visibility, and ship combat. Players can build a Seer’s Shrine to predict storms and craft runes to lessen these effects.
idea_3: This feature allows players to create quests with triggers, dialogue, and objectives, share them via codes, and access weekly selected quests with system-verified rewards.
idea_4: This feature activates special duo skills when specific pairs fight together, provides short story missions to unlock and upgrade them, and recommends bonds based on enemy scouting.
idea_5: This feature adds caravans and river convoys that deliver supplies to armies and forts. Players can build waystations and escorts, and supply lines can be disrupted by sabotage or ambushes.
idea_6: This feature lets alliances set raid plans ahead of time, runs them automatically at scheduled times, and shows participants replay highlights and performance data when they log in.
idea_7: This feature lets players create and manage agreements about non-aggression, borders, and resource rights using map markers and notifications for any violations.
idea_8: This feature provides a free simulator that uses scout data to test troop combinations and counters, allows sharing battle plans, and offers quick build suggestions.
idea_9: This feature spawns roaming beasts for all players, includes tracking, trapping, and multi-phase boss fights with assigned roles, and drops trophies that create city set pieces with effects.
idea_10: This feature pairs experienced players with new players for practice sessions focused on goals and provides temporary protection boosts. Both players receive rewards.

idea_1: This feature allows players to collect limited-time ingredient and upgrade coupons from a deals board, which are automatically applied at checkout. More coupons are earned by completing daily service streaks.
idea_2: This feature allows players to complete consecutive cooking actions to fill a Trick Meter, which increases tips and speed. Advanced trick sets provide additional challenges and leaderboards.
idea_3: This feature allows you to record voice notes by long-pressing, transcribes them automatically, attaches them to recipe steps, enables sharing with your guild, and pauses during rushes.
idea_4: This feature allows you to create a chef avatar by choosing pronouns, body types, and uniforms, access festival-themed cosmetics, and reserve pop-up stalls during festival weeks.
idea_5: This feature provides mini-games between levels, like whisking, popping pastries, or customizing an aquarium, where players can earn small rewards.
idea_6: This feature allows you to unlock premium appliances by paying in installments according to your star rating, with a checklist to track payments and access advanced kitchens early.
idea_7: This feature allows you to record slow-motion or boomerang clips of cooking, add stickers, frames, and emotes, and automatically generates short highlight videos.
idea_8: This feature lets users design a custom crest and menu logo using templates and shapes, then place them on menus, uniforms, food trucks, and banners.
idea_9: This feature offers a monthly subscription that includes changing recipes, seasonal kitchens, cosmetic items, device sharing, and weekly tokens for inviting friends to co-op play. Non-subscribers get one free item each week.
idea_10: This feature lets you download kitchens and missions to play offline, queue tasks that finish over time, and sync your progress and rewards when connected again.

idea_1: This feature lets players create multi-course meals by selecting dishes that match guests' tastes, cultural rules, and allergies, and rewards them for organized themes and serving order.
idea_2: This feature lets 2 to 4 players cook together in one kitchen, each handling different tasks and working together to earn combo points and shared rewards.
idea_3: This feature adjusts ingredient prices and freshness according to seasons, weather, and festivals. Players can preorder, complete side-quests, or trade with friends to get rare items.
idea_4: This feature allows players to unlock cooking techniques and appliance upgrades through skill trees, combining perks to create new moves that change gameplay in levels.
idea_5: This feature adds random events such as special diet requests, equipment issues, inspections, or visitor arrivals, prompting players to choose immediate or delayed responses with varying outcomes.
idea_6: This feature allows players to place sauce and garnishes on dishes with physics effects, view them in augmented reality, and get scores from community judging.
idea_7: This feature introduces rival chefs who spread rumors or bribe suppliers. Players manage quality seals, staff loyalty, and secure preparation to keep their ratings.
idea_8: This feature allows you to compete against recorded runs of other players in your kitchen layout, helping you practice routes and unlock tools and emotes.
idea_9: This feature lets players adjust controls, use colorblind-friendly indicators, receive vibration timing cues, and enable a rhythm-tap mode for each restaurant.
idea_10: This feature introduces daily rules like “no dairy” or “tiny portions” that modify gameplay. Players can opt in to earn additional rewards and cosmetic items.

idea_1: This Feature offers brief room-planning tasks with set requirements, provides instant feedback, and records daily practice to monitor user progress.
idea_2: This feature lets users download furniture, textures, and lighting collections for offline use and organize favorite items into playlists for quick access without internet.
idea_3: This feature uses location, window direction, and weather data to simulate sunlight, temperature, and humidity in each room and recommends appropriate materials and layouts.
idea_4: This feature identifies clearance issues, door swing conflicts, outlet spacing, slip hazards, and code violations while placing items, providing notifications with summaries and suggested solutions.
idea_5: This feature lets children design a basic version of their room with stickers, colors, and approved furniture, and allows parents to transfer chosen elements to the main design.
idea_6: This feature allows you to take a photo or scan a QR code of an item to find similar products by finish, shape, and size, and save or share filter settings.
idea_7: This feature lets users hold live co-design sessions with others, allowing pointing, voting, editing, assigning roles, and voice chat, with invite-based credit tracking.
idea_8: This feature simulates how speech and music sound with chosen furniture and finishes, applies a hearing profile, and suggests rugs, panels, and layouts to improve sound clarity.
idea_9: This feature allows users to see before and after room photos from nearby users, send messages for advice or trades, and manage payments with verified designers and sellers.
idea_10: This feature tracks tasks, expenses, lead times, and deliveries for each room, offering reminders, progress bars, and checklists to organize and monitor project steps.

idea_1: This feature uses AI to generate room layouts for various events, offering step-by-step plans that include budgets, shopping lists, and timelines for each stage.
idea_2: This feature shows items available in your area with stock and delivery information, and replaces delayed products with similar options based on style, size, and price.
idea_3: This feature displays sunlight and shadows by hour and season in AR, then provides recommended lighting fixture quantities, beam angles, color temperatures, and estimated energy use.
idea_4: This feature uses your phone and room materials to measure sound reflection and noise paths, then provides suggestions for rugs, panels, curtains, and layout changes with audio previews.
idea_5: This feature scans a room to detect outlets, vents, radiators, doors, and studs, checks clearances and airflow, and identifies common building-code issues before purchase.
idea_6: This feature adds dimension-matched secondhand or refurbished items from local sources, displays carbon and cost savings compared to new items, and allows trade-in of existing pieces.
idea_7: This feature identifies potential hazards in a room design, such as sharp corners and unstable shelves, suggests safety improvements, and checks robot vacuum cleaning paths.
idea_8: This feature tracks daily movement patterns to find crowded or unused areas and recommends changes to furniture placement, storage, and clearances to improve space use.
idea_9: This feature uses AR to display mounting heights, tile layouts, and anchor locations, generates a tool and parts checklist, and verifies measurements and level during installation.
idea_10: This feature analyzes a user’s liked items and moodboards to identify preferences and suggests matching color schemes and furniture sets with itemized costs.

idea_1: This Feature lets you practice painting, tile layouts, or saw cuts on a virtual surface, offering daily exercises, instant feedback, and tracking your progress.
idea_2: This feature allows customers to rate tools for specific tasks, add photos to reviews after 30 and 180 days, and filter reviews by climate, material, and usage frequency.
idea_3: This feature allows you to invite others to your project board to collaborate, comment, share shopping lists, find contacts with tools, and share your cart and pickup information.
idea_4: This feature lets you order lumber, pipe, and sheet goods with chosen dimensions, edge and hole options, see prices, reduce waste, and schedule pickup or delivery.
idea_5: This feature measures noise levels with your phone, notifies you when hearing protection is needed, recommends protective equipment, and saves noise exposure along with project information.
idea_6: This feature checks local weather forecasts to suggest appropriate times for outdoor projects and sends alerts with shopping lists for needed supplies.
idea_7: This feature lets you download product manuals, diagrams, how-to videos, an offline store map, and saved product SKUs for use without an internet connection.
idea_8: This feature accepts measurements in different formats and voice input, verifies accuracy, converts units, calculates quantities with waste, and prints barcode labels for cuts.
idea_9: This feature allows you to rent tools for 24 to 72 hours, apply rental fees toward purchase, and manage rentals and warranties within the app.
idea_10: This feature lets users share before and after photos, tag products used, ask questions to the community, and earn points that can be redeemed for rewards.

idea_1: This feature uses your phone’s LiDAR to measure a room, calculate required materials, add items to your cart, reserve tools, and schedule deliveries.
idea_2: This feature allows you to enter your address and project type to create a permit checklist with product details and plan templates. It also tracks inspections, submits forms, and identifies compliance issues.
idea_3: This feature provides a step-by-step aisle guide with bay numbers, shelf images, and alternative options. It allows hands-free scanning and works without an internet connection.
idea_4: This feature lets you take a photo of a screw, fitting, blade, or filter, identifies its size and specifications, shows matching products with aisle locations, and enables staff pickup requests.
idea_5: This feature calculates tool rental time for your project, organizes required accessories, readies items for curbside pickup, and offers checklists and video logs for returns.
idea_6: This feature allows you to select a delivery location using AR, verifies vehicle cargo capacity at checkout, and provides cut plans or delivery and tie-down suggestions.
idea_7: This feature shows a sustainability score with savings, payback, and local rebates for products, fills rebate forms using receipts, and suggests alternative products with price and ROI details.
idea_8: This feature connects you with verified experts for live video help, allowing them to mark up your camera feed and save notes and parts to your cart and project.
idea_9: This feature allows you to create a digital ticket for services such as cutting or paint mixing, monitor your wait time, and ask an associate to bring items to your aisle.
idea_10: This feature organizes project materials, rentals, deliveries, returns, and labor referrals, creates quotes with markups and tax, reserves inventory, and schedules deliveries by timeline.

idea_1: This Feature lets players make consecutive jumps using trampolines and cliffs, build score multipliers with timing, unlock animal moves, and resets progress if actions are missed.
idea_2: This feature records short sounds through the microphone, detects patterns such as whistles or chirps, and then generates related creatures or gives Echo Coins.
idea_3: This feature suggests habitats to visit, calculates coin costs and time required, generates a task checklist, and lets users reserve coins to avoid accidental spending.
idea_4: This Feature lets you rent ride animals for missions, book them ahead of time, and receive rewards when you return them without damage.
idea_5: This feature offers a weekly 3D diorama view, access to exclusive gliders and cosmetics, and rotating community giveaways that update regularly for all users.
idea_6: This feature lets you draw shapes or select points on the map to calculate travel distance, forage area, coin yield, stamina cost, and suggests routes based on safety or combos.
idea_7: This Feature lets players create habitats by placing dens, perches, and bridges with accurate alignment and surface checks. Night mode adds harder placement tasks for special blueprints.
idea_8: This feature allows you to collect clip coupons during events, save them in a wallet, and automatically use them during upgrades or checkout while managing rules and expiration.
idea_9: This feature lets players pair compatible animals, complete themed mini-quests, and unlock hybrid offspring with unique abilities. Player choices impact the sanctuary and future interactions.
idea_10: This feature lets you download short expeditions and foraging runs to play without internet. Rewards and daily challenges update when you reconnect online.

idea_1: This feature allows players to pair animals to activate abilities and coin multipliers in specific biomes, with progress tracked by a bond meter increased through shared missions.
idea_2: This feature allows players to use extra coins in a timing mini-game to create charms, which can be attached to animals or gear and later removed or combined.
idea_3: This Feature allows players to gather map pieces to form expeditions with varying risk levels, earn coins based on risk, and receive hints after unsuccessful high-risk attempts.
idea_4: This feature allows users to scan surfaces using optional AR to locate virtual tracks and caches, supports geofencing and indoor use, and enables sharing trails for nearby cooperative play.
idea_5: This feature lets players create habitats with bonuses, assign animals to worker roles for earning coins and training skills, and apply adjacency bonuses in habitat layouts.
idea_6: This feature changes animal appearances, boss behaviors, and coin types according to weather and time. Players can craft totems to temporarily change local weather. Seasonal events introduce special animals and items.
idea_7: This feature lets 3–5 players create squads, set gadgets, decoys, or silence zones separately, and then perform actions together to earn rewards.
idea_8: This feature includes timed events where players complete mini-games to diagnose and treat injured or orphaned animals. Released animals may return with coins or information.
idea_9: This feature lets players trade animals, charms, and map fragments in a bazaar with escrow and reputation scores, including events that change supply and demand temporarily.
idea_10: This feature records coin spending on habitats and upgrades, alters biome conditions and NPC relationships, and unlocks various endings with global effects and New Game+ options.

idea_1: This feature helps users practice blending, shading, and color harmony with short exercises, provides adaptive hints, tracks progress, and shows side-by-side before and after comparisons.
idea_2: This feature lets users install community-created palettes, brushes, textures, and page add-ons with one tap, while handling updates and compatibility automatically.
idea_3: This feature generates color palettes and themes based on the local weather and provides optional notifications for breaks and calming activities during app use.
idea_4: This feature lets you download coloring collections and soundtracks for offline use, organize pages into playlists by mood or length, and skip pages while playing.
idea_5: This feature generates a travel-themed coloring plan with location-based pages, estimates how long it will take, allows offline downloading, and gives hourly stretch reminders.
idea_6: This feature lets users search images by theme, difficulty, time, line thickness, palette style, and safety tags, and save or share filter settings with QR codes.
idea_7: This feature includes large tap targets, voice prompts, and a mascot that gives feedback. It allows parents to lock tools, set playlists, and track usage.
idea_8: This feature lets users ask for feedback on color choices, contrast, and technique, receive optional AI suggestions, and participate in weekly review exchanges with others.
idea_9: This feature adds animated glitter, glaze, and shimmer effects that change with brush speed or background music, and enables exporting short looping videos and high-resolution images.
idea_10: This feature lets users join teams for weekly tasks, share color palettes with nearby players, create murals from tiles, and earn rewards by referring others.

idea_1: This feature plays music during coloring, suggests color palettes, animates brush effects to match the beat, and records a time-lapse synced with the music.
idea_2: This feature allows you to tap to add 3D shading by choosing light direction and intensity, which applies highlights and shadows on an adjustable layer.
idea_3: This feature allows you to display finished artwork on walls using AR, adjust frame, lighting, and size settings, and share a link to view the AR scene.
idea_4: This feature lets users color together in real time, assign sections, communicate through chat or reactions, and use relay mode that rotates the canvas every 30 seconds.
idea_5: This feature allows you to capture colors using your camera, complete tasks by finding specific tones, and unlock themed coloring pages with the collected colors.
idea_6: This feature adjusts brush size based on breathing, increasing it during inhaling and decreasing it during exhaling, with accompanying vibrations and background sounds.
idea_7: This feature allows you to fill a section with paint, move the paint by tilting your phone, lock the pattern, and apply effects such as marbling, glitter, and metallic inks.
idea_8: This feature allows users to color storybooks, with their color choices influencing the plot and unlocking different scenes and endings saved as a personalized story.
idea_9: This feature modifies colors for different types of color blindness and low vision by adding patterns, high-contrast outlines, and voice prompts that identify colors and sections.
idea_10: This feature lets users color sticker templates, automatically cut and trim them, and export transparent stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, and Telegram, with an optional in-app keyboard.

idea_1: This feature offers a practice mode that guides users through gestures, voice commands, and casting shortcuts, detects errors, and provides review sessions to help improve skills.
idea_2: This feature sends TV audio to your phone or earbuds with minimal delay, enhances speech clarity, supports personal hearing settings, and includes volume limits for safety.
idea_3: This feature lets users check and rate TV and box compatibility, share setup tips, submit missing codes, and vote on remote control mappings.
idea_4: This feature allows users to earn points by completing tasks such as pairing devices, using shortcuts, verifying codes, and taking short surveys within the app.
idea_5: This feature lets users earn and use points for premium features, remote skins, or gift cards, and gain bonus points when invited friends connect a device.
idea_6: This feature lets you search and browse streaming apps in one menu, cast content with one tap, use keyboard input, and automatically detect OTPs for sign-ins and searches.
idea_7: This feature lets users create command sequences for various situations and share, rate, and download community-created recipes, device add-ons, and themes.
idea_8: This feature displays weather alerts on the TV as banners, allows volume or caption adjustments for severe events, shows hourly forecasts as a screensaver, and updates travel destination weather.
idea_9: This feature displays nearby screens with a trust score, requires a QR code or one-time PIN to connect, and enables sending temporary control links.
idea_10: This feature allows you to queue and cast downloaded videos, music, and photos to your TV without internet, supporting continuous playback with pre-buffering, gapless audio, and automatic resume.

idea_1: This feature lets you switch an active cast between TVs or rooms without stopping playback, keeping the current timestamp, subtitles, audio settings, and preloading the next screen.
idea_2: This feature uses the phone’s microphones to detect surrounding noise and distance, then automatically adjusts volume, dialog clarity, and dynamic range, with optional quiet-night mode and private listening.
idea_3: This feature allows you to use your phone as a motion-controlled mouse and gesture pad to navigate TV menus, adjust volume, skip content, and control web browsers or apps.
idea_4: This feature uses the camera to show test patterns and automatically adjust color, brightness, and sync on supported TVs, or gives on-screen instructions if control is not available.
idea_5: This feature allows you to set up one-tap scenes that control your TV, inputs, soundbar, lights, and curtains, activated by widget, voice, location, or schedule.
idea_6: This feature lets you send a secure link with a PIN to someone, allowing them to control your TV remotely for a set time and draw guides on their phone.
idea_7: This feature allows you to search for titles across streaming services, view availability and price, open the app on the TV with the correct profile, enter login codes, and use the phone’s keyboard for text input.
idea_8: This feature lets you control and cast to supported TVs using Wi-Fi Direct, Bluetooth, or your phone’s hotspot without internet, and includes options for hotel networks and resetting TV settings.
idea_9: This feature shows captions on the phone while casting, lets users adjust font, size, and contrast, allows tapping lines to navigate, and supports live translation.
idea_10: This feature lets multiple users add and vote on videos in a shared queue, synchronizes playback on TVs, and offers optional low-latency voice chat.

idea_1: This feature allows players to trace solved verse words with Bible-themed brushes, receive immediate AI feedback on spacing and strokes, and create shareable stickers and profile logos.
idea_2: This feature offers continuous word puzzles based on biblical scenes, includes soft background music, and lets players collect bonus items and change colors while playing.
idea_3: This feature sends notifications about streak endings, time-limited scripture events, and when friends beat your score. It also tracks completed books and themes.
idea_4: This feature lets users download audio verse packs for offline listening, choose different narrator voices, and change playback speed while working on puzzles.
idea_5: This feature allows users to create puzzle playlists from chosen books or themes, play them in order or shuffled, and delay ads and popups until a set break.
idea_6: This feature offers voice-guided hints, larger tiles, collectible Bible characters, and a parent dashboard to control difficulty, session length, and accessible content.
idea_7: This feature gives daily coupons that automatically reduce the cost of hints, boosts, or premium packs at checkout. More coupons are earned by completing certain game tasks.
idea_8: This feature allows you to customize puzzles by selecting books, themes, translations, difficulty levels, excluding proper nouns, focusing on Greek or Hebrew roots, and saving or sharing settings.
idea_9: This feature allows players to record voice notes after a verse, converts speech to text for searching and sharing, and enables speaking found words for input.
idea_10: This feature offers weekly multi-level boss puzzles with unique tile challenges and hazards. Players can work with friends to share limited one-time assistance during the puzzles.

idea_1: This feature allows you to choose a related verse after solving one, forming themed chains. Completing chains unlocks badges and changes the game’s difficulty.
idea_2: This feature allows you to tap solved words to view their Greek or Hebrew root, transliteration, and meaning, use hint tokens to connect root letters to English answers, and play optional rounds forming English words from biblical roots.
idea_3: This feature plays a verse aloud as you arrange words in order, allowing you to slow or repeat the audio and earn points based on accuracy.
idea_4: This feature lets two players play at the same time, each using different letters to complete a verse, with timed moves adding bonus points.
idea_5: This feature uses your camera to locate virtual scrolls in your surroundings, unlocking themed word puzzles and allowing you to collect scrolls to complete a 3D gallery with information.
idea_6: This feature creates a memory deck from completed verses that reappears with spaced repetition, gradually hiding words, and includes a recall strength meter to guide daily reviews.
idea_7: This feature creates a short devotional from the completed verse and solved words, generates a shareable image, and lets you select a tone before exporting.
idea_8: This feature allows users to create puzzles from Bible verses by selecting a translation, adding hints and reflections, and enables sharing, rating, and moderating puzzles.
idea_9: This feature allows you to take a photo of a church bulletin or Bible page and generates a word puzzle using the text from the image.
idea_10: This feature allows you to explore a map with pins that unlock themed word sets and notes. Completing areas rewards collector cards and offline study materials.

idea_1: This feature allows users to press and hold to record voice notes that are automatically converted into text tasks. Users can choose to share or keep these notes private.
idea_2: This feature creates child-friendly profiles with easy tasks and gentle ASMR sounds, letting family members complete chores individually while the room updates for everyone.
idea_3: This feature includes more than 30 small activities with different sounds, like unpacking and gardening, along with daily challenges that combine tasks for additional rewards.
idea_4: This feature offers a steady-hand mode with haptic and sound feedback for accurate painting, grout filling, and trim cutting, along with offline drills to practice and unlock tool skins.
idea_5: This feature lets players collect coupons and discounts from a decor catalog to lower material costs and join weekly thrift store events with limited items and bargaining games.
idea_6: This feature allows players to complete 2-minute makeover challenges in the same room using the same tools, with points awarded by audience or AI based on set criteria.
idea_7: This feature allows players to tap, swipe, and hold to match sanding, tiling, and hammering actions. Accurate timing raises scores and unlocks new soundtracks.
idea_8: This feature allows you to locate and repair minor problems such as scuffs, missing screws, and misaligned tiles in hidden-object scenes with one-tap actions.
idea_9: This feature lets users change sound settings, manage tools, save audio mixes, and use timer and tool controls through a connected smartwatch.
idea_10: This feature shows eco-grade ratings for paints, fabrics, and woods based on fumes, sustainability, and durability. Client preferences update according to your choices.

idea_1: This feature generates a 3D model of your room from a photo, applies sound effects to surfaces, allows task completion, and exports before-and-after images.
idea_2: This feature uses head-tracked binaural audio to change sounds based on device movement and includes hidden audio cues that signal imperfections when listened to closely.
idea_3: This feature allows players to tap and hear different material sounds before placing them and includes client requests for specific sound combinations to receive extra tips.
idea_4: This feature offers various haptic feedback based on pressure and angle, enabling users to adjust settings and use touch signals to complete tasks without visual input.
idea_5: This feature allows you to choose sounds, set their frequency, and mute others. A mini-game detects relaxing sounds and plays them more often during the game.
idea_6: This feature allows you to paint, polish, and tile following a metronome beat, with an option for a slower mode to adjust the pace and relaxation score.
idea_7: This feature allows you to gather materials from tasks and create custom decor by cutting, sanding, staining, and varnishing with different sound effects. You can share designs and receive rewards.
idea_8: This feature allows players to listen to soft voice notes with background sounds that provide client preferences. Players use these clues to select decor and earn rewards.
idea_9: This feature allows friends to complete makeover steps one after another at different times, adding sound layers that combine into a final audio mix when all steps are done.
idea_10: This feature generates a 10–20 second vertical video after each makeover, displaying the transformation with original sounds and clickable areas that connect to related tasks.

idea_1: This feature offers a practice environment with simulated trading, guided exercises, an AI coach that explains order types, provides feedback, tracks progress, and presents daily market challenges.
idea_2: This feature lets users create and adjust trade orders by choosing amount, price, stop-loss, and time-in-force, and allows saving and reusing these orders.
idea_3: This feature lets verified asset holders share short pros, cons, and risk notes with sources and holding-time badges. AI summarizes views and highlights minority opinions.
idea_4: This feature lets users invite friends, share watchlists, compare anonymized investing habits, join mentorship prompts, and earn rewards through referrals linked to learning and portfolio diversity.
idea_5: This feature offers short quizzes and games that let users earn points or tickets, which can be exchanged for fractional shares, fee discounts, savings boosts, or donations, with daily limits.
idea_6: This feature lets parents manage family accounts by enabling Kid Mode, which includes lessons, savings goals, custodial gifting, parental controls, and activity-based rewards for children.
idea_7: This feature shows a dashboard with upcoming events related to your portfolio, including earnings, rate decisions, and volatility, along with alerts and recommended actions.
idea_8: This feature lets you browse stocks, ETFs, and crypto using a swipe interface with compatibility scores based on your risk, time frame, and interests. Filters can be saved, shared, and applied to watchlists automatically.
idea_9: This feature creates detailed records for each transaction with cost basis, fees, and dividends, and lets users search, tag, and organize their history by asset, strategy, or goal.
idea_10: This feature pauses noncritical alerts during chosen hours, resumes them with a summary, allows emergency alerts if enabled, and provides customizable notifications and an adaptive number pad.

idea_1: This feature distributes investments across taxable accounts, IRAs, and crypto according to a risk setting, pauses during high market volatility, and allows indexing and factor adjustments.
idea_2: This feature displays estimated taxes before trades, provides wash sale alerts, enables lot selection, and supports scheduled tax-loss harvesting and year-end tax bracket planning.
idea_3: This feature invests spare cash into Treasury bills that mature before your bill due dates, uses the proceeds to pay bills automatically, and maintains a set emergency cash buffer.
idea_4: This feature allows users to select trade routing by speed, cost, or avoiding dark pools, provides a post-trade receipt with execution details, and generates monthly trade performance reports.
idea_5: This feature explains proxy details, sets default voting options, allows following voting profiles, and automatically recalls lent shares before record dates to preserve voting rights.
idea_6: This feature evaluates your portfolio under different economic scenarios and lets you apply recommended hedges or rebalances, showing the associated costs and protection details.
idea_7: This feature builds a personalized investment portfolio using a benchmark, lets users exclude sectors, set ESG and factor preferences, and manages taxes with loss harvesting and gain budgeting.
idea_8: This feature lets groups create shared accounts to invest together, manage trades and taxes automatically, set recurring contributions, vote, assign roles, track watchlists, and communicate within the app.
idea_9: This feature offers a secured credit line backed by your portfolio or Treasuries, enabling credit use without selling assets, with automatic cashback investing and adjustable limits.
idea_10: This feature lets users donate shares or cash, get instant receipts, keep a charitable balance invested, set recurring donations, and track grant activity within the app.

idea_1: This Feature lets players add or remove slot packs, automatically removes unused machines, and provides occasional limited-time packs with event-related bonuses.
idea_2: This feature allows you to collect machine and avatar skins that change reels, frames, and sounds without affecting gameplay. You can share styles with friends and earn small rewards for completing sets.
idea_3: This feature provides a daily word-guess game with Vegas-related words, giving coins or booster fragments for correct answers and a bonus token for solving the puzzle perfectly.
idea_4: This Feature allows you to collect and use decor from spins, quests, and events to customize a virtual Vegas suite that provides passive bonuses and includes a photomode.
idea_5: This feature allows you to browse and reserve real rewards by date, add them to your Wallet or Calendar, receive reminders, and get location-based alerts for redemption in Las Vegas.
idea_6: This Feature adds 3–5 minute Sprint Tournaments where players complete specific tasks such as hitting bonus rounds and switching machines. Rankings depend on machine choices and booster use.
idea_7: This feature enables 3v3 or 5v5 Club Battles where teams choose machines, use time-limited boosts, complete shared goals, and earn rewards such as cosmetics and chips.
idea_8: This Feature sends optional notifications about expiring points, event rewards, nearby partner locations, and limited-time offers, with settings to adjust quiet hours, frequency, and alert grouping.
idea_9: This feature provides optional short puzzles between spins to earn coins or booster shards and tracks weekly progress to unlock cosmetic items or suite decorations.
idea_10: This Feature adds Apple Watch and Android Wear complications that show LP and event timers, allow quick daily check-ins or booster activations with biometric confirmation, and send haptic alerts before sprints or reservation windows.

idea_1: This feature allows you to select a destination and dates, then provides a daily plan showing games and missions that earn rewards for hotels, dining, or shows.
idea_2: This feature offers a live reward marketplace where users can bid on items, join waitlists, and get automatic redemptions or alternative options based on availability and price.
idea_3: This feature allows clubs to start timed Team Raids where members spin together to defeat a boss and earn Group Tokens for group rewards.
idea_4: This feature provides an optional AR scavenger hunt at partner locations where users collect chips and bonus LP to unlock in-venue rewards and location-based cosmetics.
idea_5: This Feature automatically spins eligible slots based on set LP goals and coin or time limits, while following stop-loss, cool-down, and health prompt rules.
idea_6: This feature lets verified friends combine loyalty points for one group redemption, tracks each contribution, holds points in escrow, and automatically refunds if the order changes.
idea_7: This Feature lets players convert LP into Reward Credits that remain valid for 6–12 months and can be used, combined, or shared with a travel companion.
idea_8: This Feature allows you to create a reward wish list, receive alerts for inventory and price changes, view nearby offers, and apply earned coupons or multipliers with one tap.
idea_9: This Feature allows users to link external loyalty accounts to receive small in-game boosts, access priority reward windows, participate in partner status challenges, and obtain limited-time cross-perks after reaching milestones.
idea_10: This feature provides live events tied to major Vegas occasions, offering themed mission bonuses and reward boosts, along with shareable calendars for scheduling play and redemption.

idea_1: This feature offers short tasks to practice prompt writing, camera movements, composition, and lighting, provides instant AI feedback, tracks progress, and supports inviting friends to join.
idea_2: This feature creates videos by syncing cuts, camera movements, and effects to the beats of a song, allowing adjustments for different rhythms and transitions.
idea_3: This feature lets creators submit drafts for peer review, collects scores on story, pacing, and visuals, then uses AI to summarize feedback and suggest prompt changes.
idea_4: This feature allows users to complete tasks, daily activities, and reviews to earn credits for 4K renders, premium styles, or gift cards, with seasonal challenges unlocking effects and badges.
idea_5: This feature automatically changes resolution, frame rate, HDR, and bitrate for each scene according to the target platform and allows switching between low-resolution previews and high-quality output.
idea_6: This feature lets users schedule video rendering, track the rendering queue, get notifications when videos are complete, share credits with others, and receive low-credit alerts.
idea_7: This feature saves project versions by tracking prompts, assets, costs, and outputs, provides comparison views and rollbacks, and allows exporting receipts and viewing compute usage per shot.
idea_8: This feature allows users to create video recipes by arranging elements such as camera paths, lighting, textures, motion, transitions, and sound into reusable cards.
idea_9: This feature generates multilingual subtitles with speaker labels and word highlights, and uses AI to stabilize shaky videos by adding virtual camera movements and cleaning the background.
idea_10: This feature offers a marketplace where users can find and install worlds, characters, vehicles, effects, and physics that work with prompts for easy use and combination.

idea_1: This feature creates a shot list with camera directions and durations from a script, offers preview renders, and lets users adjust the number of shots and their pacing.
idea_2: This feature lets users choose characters, props, colors, and locations once and keeps their appearance and style consistent across different projects with continuity options.
idea_3: This feature allows you to import dialogue and assign speakers to create multi-character videos with synchronized lip movements, eye contact, and camera angles, including angle swaps and line edits.
idea_4: This feature records a one-minute video of your face and body using your phone to create a control rig for an avatar’s expressions, gestures, and voice timing.
idea_5: This feature allows you to choose an object in a video frame and change its color or texture, with those changes applied consistently throughout the video.
idea_6: This feature adds a physics simulation that applies wind, cloth, hair, particle, and water effects across shots, controlled by an environment timeline for gravity and turbulence.
idea_7: This feature lets users add a music track, and the editor automatically changes cuts, camera movements, transitions, and effects to align with the audio's beats and sections.
idea_8: This feature lets users create camera movements with real lens settings, preview the motion as a wireframe path, and generate a video with effects like lens breathing and bokeh.
idea_9: This feature allows you to position virtual actors and cameras in a space, record their movements, and automatically generate a scene with the same setup.
idea_10: This feature lets you record on a greenscreen and automatically adds relighting, shadows, light wrap, motion parallax, and reflections to align with the background.

idea_1: This feature adds jump notes and trampolines that let players flick upward to switch lanes, perform combos, avoid obstacles, and increase score multipliers.
idea_2: This feature lets users earn Beat Coupons from streaks and events, collect them, and use them at checkout for mods, tracks, or passes; QR codes redeem instantly.
idea_3: This feature records sounds from the microphone, creates a playable chart with automatic instruments, allows difficulty changes, and enables users to share it as a community challenge.
idea_4: This feature allows you to create a Sound Tank that reacts to your last match, collect coins or samples by tapping, and customize it with unlockable creatures and props.
idea_5: This feature gives temporary access to mods and skins during events and lets users unlock items individually or in bundles with discounts based on usage.
idea_6: This feature lets users create animated team logos and use them on player cards, banners, and stage backgrounds during battles and tournaments.
idea_7: This feature offers a tournament navigator that includes skill level filters, regional bracket displays, check-in tracking, and reminders to assist players in managing match schedules.
idea_8: This feature sorts songs by BPM and genre and provides calculators to estimate chart time, note density, finger-travel distance, and stamina for practice planning.
idea_9: This feature offers a Rhythm Wellness mode with session timers, adjustable note speed for practice, content filters for children, and optional weekly activity summaries for parents.
idea_10: This feature lets users record looped rehearsal clips with notes and EQ, send voice or text challenges to contacts, and record battles with selfie commentary and meme overlays.

idea_1: This feature changes the track’s layers and note patterns according to your accuracy, adding more instruments and complexity with streaks, and reducing them after misses.
idea_2: This feature lets users play offline challenges against recorded runs from top players or friends, with options to change lane mapping for different hand movements.
idea_3: This feature lets two players play together on one device or online, controlling separate lanes with shared health and combo systems and coordinated handoffs.
idea_4: This feature uses on-device AI to generate draft charts from beatboxing, humming, or original tracks, and provides tools for editing, tempo detection, difficulty adjustment, and copyright checking.
idea_5: This feature lets users combine mods, skins, and note effects, identifies conflicts, suggests fixes, and shows a preview of performance and timing before applying them.
idea_6: This feature offers specific vibration patterns for various sounds and includes a calibration tool to align touch, audio, visuals, and vibrations with minimal delay.
idea_7: This feature offers short practice drills for specific patterns, changes speed according to your mistakes, and provides analysis with warm-up and song level recommendations.
idea_8: This feature offers one-hand mode with slide and hold controls, adjustable lane numbers, colorblind-friendly colors, scalable outlines, audio cues, and haptic feedback for accessibility.
idea_9: This feature manages weekly tournaments with ELO-based rankings and divisions, enables live spectating with emotes, and performs server-side verification of replays to detect irregularities.
idea_10: This feature uses the camera to place characters and effects in your environment, shows visual effects during streaks, and generates collectibles based on player accuracy.

idea_1: This feature allows players to perform chain dives, wall-jumps, and jukes through quick-time sequences. Completing chains fills a Momentum Meter that temporarily increases clutch stats. Weekly challenges help unlock new animations.
idea_2: This feature displays stadium size, altitude, and wind conditions, calculates home run probabilities from exit velocity and launch angle, and recommends defensive shifts, pitch plans, and pinch hitters.
idea_3: This feature lets you plan travel, lodging, and rest days for away games, impacting player stamina and team chemistry depending on factors like traffic or weather delays.
idea_4: This feature records chants or riffs, cleans and loops them automatically, syncs them to players or moments, and enables sharing and triggering crowd sing-alongs during rallies.
idea_5: This feature displays the impact of trades, signings, or extensions on your budget and lineup, verifies roster and fund availability, and compares deal options side by side.
idea_6: This feature allows you to record voice notes tied to innings, pitches, or hitters, converts them to text for searching, and lets you share or pin them to scouting reports.
idea_7: This feature offers 3D replays with adjustable camera angles, augmented reality field views, and volumetric replays. Users can export videos and receive trial reminders and cosmetic items.
idea_8: This feature lets you collect and organize tactic cards for different game situations and use them during matches, with limits based on stamina and cooldown times.
idea_9: This Feature allows users to create logos and mascots using layers and gradients, export images as PNG files, and add animated stingers and emotes for streams and tournaments.
idea_10: This feature records the last 20–60 seconds of gameplay with optional microphone audio, noise reduction, and stat overlays. It saves, tags, and shares clips with one tap.

idea_1: This feature analyzes your and your opponent’s pitching patterns, provides pitch sequence suggestions before each at-bat, and allows you to follow, change, or skip them.
idea_2: This feature shows swing path, contact point, launch angle, exit velocity, and pitch spin during play. After each at-bat, it recommends one adjustment drill.
idea_3: This feature lets up to nine players join a club, take different team roles, and work together to complete tasks and compete against other clubs each week.
idea_4: This feature simulates weather, altitude, humidity, and wind effects on ball flight, stamina, and grip, includes stadium traits, and lets managers set the roof and prepare the ballpark before games.
idea_5: This feature provides mini-season storylines lasting 2–3 weeks, where your decisions influence team chemistry, morale, and unlock perks that apply to your roster.
idea_6: This feature uses AR to create training drills in your space with timing and reaction exercises based on your roster. Completing daily sets gives temporary performance boosts.
idea_7: This feature updates stadium elements such as sound, lighting, and fan areas, and adds theme nights and music that temporarily increase player performance during home games.
idea_8: This feature automatically records important moments, creates vertical highlight videos with team templates and commentary, and shares top reels weekly with rewards for creators and players.
idea_9: This feature allows you to change pitch grip, finger pressure, seam orientation, and release timing to affect pitch movement, control, and speed. Matching grips with the catcher gives bonuses.
idea_10: This feature shows various umpire strike zones, allows a limited number of challenges with 3D Zone Review replays, and changes future calls based on game results.

idea_1: This feature lets players perform movements such as trampolines, vaults, wall-runs, and table-hops to build a combo meter that provides speed boosts or stuns bots.
idea_2: This feature allows users to save and use rotating discount coupons on revives, tickets, cosmetics, and bot rentals, with automatic application and squad sharing options.
idea_3: This feature records short voice or ambient sounds, converts them into bot chants or taunts with audio effects, and allows users to assign and share sound packs by room or bot.
idea_4: This feature automatically saves the last 10 seconds after near-catches and allows adding captions, stickers, speed effects, widgets, and high-quality audio to the clips.
idea_5: This feature offers a small pet simulation and an 11x11 tile word puzzle to play during matchmaking, enabling users to earn minor buffs while waiting.
idea_6: This feature checks your loadout, ping, and squad roles, suggests rooms and routes with risk levels, estimates escape times, and recommends session durations.
idea_7: This feature lets users temporarily rent rare bots or chase vehicles for events, provides a tutorial, and uses timed contracts that do not affect the permanent balance.
idea_8: This feature provides tools to measure distances, mark areas, show bot sightlines, and place beacons to preview paths to exits or teammates.
idea_9: This feature lets users collect and use behavior, hazard, and room-mod cards to create custom rule sets and unlock different game mode variants.
idea_10: This feature offers logo templates and mascot images for making team and room banners, which can be saved as PNG files. Hosts can set crest requirements for events.

idea_1: This feature updates rooms with popular memes by changing bot taunts, map stickers, and hazards, using regional and age filters to ensure appropriate content.
idea_2: This feature allows players to build a meme deck before a match and use combo cards during chases to activate brief effects. Community combos are named, ranked, and rewarded.
idea_3: This feature lets spectators earn tokens by predicting results and use them to trigger brief effects, while hosts set limits on how frequently these effects happen.
idea_4: This feature lets users upload a short video or audio, then adjusts the room’s visuals, sounds, and bot actions accordingly. Hosts can review and change these settings.
idea_5: This feature lets users create bots with a no-code persona builder and publish them to a marketplace where hosts can import and use the bots.
idea_6: This feature shows safe geofenced routes and displays meme bots through your camera with audio and vibration alerts. Friends can join remotely in a shared virtual room.
idea_7: This feature allows players to use emotes, taunts, and dances that show their location while giving temporary effects like increased speed or invisibility. Leaderboards record these actions separately.
idea_8: This Feature introduces boss rounds where bots change their behavior based on player actions, and players vote between waves to affect the story and map conditions.
idea_9: This feature creates vertical videos with captions, stickers, and zoom effects synced to music, credits all participants, and provides export options for schools and streams.
idea_10: This Feature lets players rewind the last three seconds for everyone, creating a short replay. Shards are limited and recharge by completing team objectives.

idea_1: This feature generates practice exercises from course goals, monitors skill changes, schedules review sessions, and displays progress maps to help organize study time.
idea_2: This feature lets you create small groups within your classes, invite peers with secure links tied to your school login, and suggests groups based on schedules or goals.
idea_3: This feature allows users to rate pages, videos, and assignments on clarity, helpfulness, and time required, add optional notes, and view summaries for review and instructor feedback.
idea_4: This feature displays a 14-day schedule with estimated busy or light study days based on due dates and effort, and allows you to adjust tasks to view different plans.
idea_5: This feature allows you to download chosen modules for offline access, automatically sync queued submissions when online, and manage conflicts by merging or selecting versions.
idea_6: This feature shows nearby classmates within a chosen distance and time who share classes, using verified badges to confirm their identity for study session connections.
idea_7: This feature allows you to adjust notifications and feeds by course, topic, and urgency, set quiet hours and escalation rules, and use shareable presets with QR codes or links.
idea_8: This feature sends notifications about academic deadlines, grade changes, or policy updates based on set criteria to keep students informed about important tasks.
idea_9: This feature gives points for submitting work on time, practicing, and assisting others, which can unlock profile badges or rewards set by the institution.
idea_10: This feature adjusts lecture audio to your hearing profile, offers live captions and searchable transcripts in your selected language, and works with earbuds for live or recorded media.

idea_1: This feature generates a weekly study schedule from your modules, deadlines, and calendar, updates it when plans change, and recommends study times based on your routine.
idea_2: This feature reviews your submission for word count, required sections, file type, citations, alt text, and attachments, and identifies any issues related to the rubric before submission.
idea_3: This feature downloads next week’s course content for offline access, updates it automatically with changes, and shows which items require an internet connection.
idea_4: This feature summarizes discussion threads into main points, open questions, and instructor notes, and alerts you when answers are posted to unresolved questions.
idea_5: This feature displays changes in assignments or syllabi and requires a single tap to confirm that you have viewed the updates.
idea_6: This feature shows who is viewing the same module and lets users join temporary audio or text study rooms that save notes to the module and close afterward.
idea_7: This feature offers a group workspace with assigned roles, task boards, deadline checklists, availability polls, location options, and a status area for sharing files.
idea_8: This feature identifies your weak areas by analyzing quiz errors, time spent on pages, and practice results, then generates short practice sets focused on those areas.
idea_9: This feature lets you ask questions and get answers based on your course materials, with references to specific pages, slides, timestamps, or discussion posts.
idea_10: This feature turns pages, announcements, or PDFs into audio playlists with adjustable speed and sentence navigation. It also lets users add voice bookmarks and notes synced across devices.

idea_1: This feature offers short writing exercises with AI feedback, tracks progress, provides weekly prompts, and includes peer practice rooms for skill development.
idea_2: This feature enhances reading and listening by using dyslexia-friendly fonts, highlighting syllables, providing distraction-free layouts, and offering adjustable text-to-speech options.
idea_3: This feature lets readers download chapter bundles by mood or series for offline reading, manages storage, removes ads offline, and syncs reading progress across devices.
idea_4: This feature displays a map of the story’s tone, intensity, reading time, content warnings, and a pacing timeline to assist with planning reading sessions.
idea_5: This feature notifies you about upcoming cliffhangers, breaks, or content warnings in series you follow and lets you choose which events and timing send alerts.
idea_6: This feature allows readers to give feedback on each chapter using templates for pacing, characters, and world-building, while AI summarizes key points for authors.
idea_7: This feature allows you to invite friends to read together, sync reading progress, chat in real time, add emoji highlights, set group checkpoints, and earn rewards for finishing sessions.
idea_8: This feature shows short text, audio, or video previews that you can swipe to save, skip, or start, with filters and a 10-minute trial for locked content.
idea_9: This feature allows users to enter short codes from BookTok or events to access extra chapters, alternate scenes, or limited titles, sometimes with location or time limits.
idea_10: This feature verifies author identities, checks for plagiarism and AI-generated content, provides a filter for verified authors, and keeps purchased chapters accessible across devices.

idea_1: This feature generates short vertical videos from selected text in chapters, adds voiceover and animations, and lets users share them with links to the specific scene in the app.
idea_2: This feature lets friends or groups read chapters together with synchronized scrolling, chat on the page, emoji reactions, and live polls to choose the next micro-chapter.
idea_3: This feature hides comments that reveal events beyond your current reading progress and provides options to view or allow spoiler content if you choose.
idea_4: This feature shows a mood timeline for each story using sentiment, pacing, and tension, and lets users filter stories by different emotional patterns.
idea_5: This feature updates a character map with relationships, aliases, and mentions. Tapping a name in the text opens a card showing images and recent scenes.
idea_6: This feature lets readers switch languages line-by-line, preserves names and formatting, and uses AI and author approval to review community edits for accuracy.
idea_7: This feature plays background sounds related to story events, like rain or heartbeats, and allows users to adjust the volume or select a quieter setting.
idea_8: This feature automatically scrolls a chosen text excerpt with highlighted words and stickers while recording your reaction, then creates a vertical video linked to that passage.
idea_9: This feature provides optional alternate viewpoints and “what-if” scenes alongside specific lines. Users can unlock them with coins and share brief previews.
idea_10: This feature creates an animated quote card from highlighted text with AI-generated images, exports it as a GIF or MP4, and includes tags for the book and author.

idea_1: This feature tracks stunt chains using trampolines, cliff drops, and table-top jumps, awarding combo multipliers for linked tricks and clean landings on specific tracks.
idea_2: This feature allows players to collect digital coupons during races and events and redeem them at pit-stop checkouts for discounts on parts, cosmetics, and entry fees.
idea_3: This feature generates race tracks from imported songs or recorded melodies by aligning beats with jumps and obstacles, and allows users to share the created tracks.
idea_4: This feature automatically saves the last 30 seconds of gameplay for quick highlights and includes a photo booth with selfie cameras, stickers, and vertical video export options.
idea_5: This feature adds a Rival Titans Gauntlet where boss crews with unique behaviors and dialogues guard regions. Defeating them unlocks parts and weekly takeover access.
idea_6: This feature adds ride companions like drones or mech-pets that provide abilities such as airtime control, slipstream sensing, and nitro efficiency. Users can collect items and change loadouts based on objectives.
idea_7: This feature lets users create clubs with custom logos or mascots, turn images into bike decals, show 3D banners in lobbies, organize giveaways, and join cooperative goals.
idea_8: This feature provides a mini-mode where players tap to tune, polish, and feed bike parts, earn idle income, and unlock cosmetic items with background sounds.
idea_9: This feature provides a Family/Kid Mode with simplified controls, gentler physics, shorter game sessions, a break timer, and bonus rewards for balanced play.
idea_10: This feature allows users to create tracks with distance, gradient, and lap time data, use a pace calculator ghost, and test rental bikes through license challenges.

idea_1: This feature changes track conditions such as grip, visibility, and puddles according to local weather, modifies AI behavior, and provides weather-based challenges with rewards.
idea_2: This feature generates AI opponents that maintain consistent behavior and adjust their racing style and reactions based on your tactics during a season.
idea_3: This feature lets players design tracks by adding curves, ramps, and hazards, then publish, edit, and race on community tracks with leaderboards and highlights.
idea_4: This feature lets you record a lap with trap cards that activate during races. Friends race against your recorded lap, and you earn rewards when traps are triggered.
idea_5: This feature uses gyro sensors for leaning, smooths throttle input, provides vibration feedback for grip loss, cornering, and RPM, and includes quick calibration for device and driving style.
idea_6: This feature allows managing crew and sponsors, includes choices affecting tire wear, grip, weight, and power, and offers mid-race objectives for additional rewards.
idea_7: This feature offers weekly events with different rules like low gravity, slipstream boosts, or mirrored controls, ending with a boss biker. Completing levels unlocks temporary parts that change riding physics.
idea_8: This feature offers one-thumb mode, automatic acceleration, brake assistance, colorblind-friendly racing lines, spatial audio alerts, and adjustable difficulty levels for each assist.
idea_9: This feature provides a 5-second rewind and shows an AI overlay with the optimal racing line, brake points, and momentum tips beside your ghost, adapting to your performance.
idea_10: This feature automatically generates short vertical highlight clips with effects after each session and lets you use AR to place your bike in your room to preview skins and take photos.

idea_1: This feature offers lessons, exercises, and quizzes to help users understand clouds, radar, and weather models for creating local weather forecasts.
idea_2: This feature lets you invite friends and nearby neighbors to share weather updates that appear on your map and affect recommendations based on your trusted contacts.
idea_3: This feature extracts time and location information from PDF, DOCX, or ICS files to create a weather plan with go/no-go windows and supports exporting it as a PDF, slides, or narrated video.
idea_4: This feature lets you set weather condition rules for specific times and locations, share or import them using QR codes, and filter radar displays based on these rules.
idea_5: This feature allows you to rate forecast accuracy by swiping, records your feedback, and updates future forecasts according to your local weather conditions.
idea_6: This feature allows users to earn points by submitting weather observations, making forecast predictions, completing learning streaks, and finishing prep checklists, which can be redeemed or donated.
idea_7: This feature conducts scheduled severe weather drills with assigned roles, provides offline shelter maps, tracks drill progress, and uses alerts such as vibrations, screen flashes, and sounds.
idea_8: This feature downloads hourly forecasts, radar images, and alerts for selected areas, updates automatically on Wi-Fi, and allows access without an internet connection.
idea_9: This feature offers weather-related supply lists that users can customize and select for pickup from nearby stores, with updates based on changing weather forecasts.
idea_10: This feature displays the weather forecast as animated characters, provides basic safety tips and audio stories, and allows parents to set limits and view activity summaries.

idea_1: This feature uses radar, anonymous phone barometer data, and vehicle wiper information to deliver minute-by-minute rain or snow forecasts with confidence levels and source information.
idea_2: This feature allows you to select a 1–3 hour weather period within the next 10 days by adjusting a slider based on dryness, wind, UV, and pollen levels. It also offers calendar adjustment suggestions for that period.
idea_3: This feature offers walking, cycling, and jogging routes that minimize exposure to wind, heat, glare, and pollen by using shade maps, shadows, terrain, and live rerouting.
idea_4: This feature records your thumbs-up or thumbs-down feedback to generate a comfort index and offers basic clothing recommendations according to the weather forecast.
idea_5: This feature displays a street-level hazard map predicting black ice, ponding, hail, and lightning times using terrain, drainage, and radar data, along with localized alerts.
idea_6: This feature estimates HVAC load, solar gain, and humidity to provide pre-cooling, window-opening, and dehumidifier schedules, and integrates with smart thermostats to automate these actions.
idea_7: This feature estimates pollen and pollution levels along your route, suggests alternative times or paths with lower exposure, and offers advice on indoor ventilation and air filtering.
idea_8: This feature uses the camera to show storm paths, lightning distance, and flood depth on your street, and works offline with stored map data during outages.
idea_9: This feature estimates outdoor noise levels based on wind, humidity, temperature inversions, and traffic data, and provides alerts when gusts may cause increased noise.
idea_10: This feature compares forecast predictions with actual observations, displays an uncertainty meter, and provides alternative plan suggestions when confidence in the forecast is low.

idea_1: This feature lets users tap ambient notes to create animated scenes and collect tokens for piano skins and backgrounds, including a visual mode suitable for children during car rides.
idea_2: This feature gathers practice coupons earned from streaks and events and automatically uses them during checkout for song packs, themes, or revive items.
idea_3: This feature includes streak-based gestures such as leaps, slides, and multi-taps for increasing scores, along with obstacle tiles and alternate lanes that require quick route choices.
idea_4: This feature detects timing and finger coordination errors, offers 60-second practice drills with instant feedback, tracks progress using graphs, and adapts lessons according to user performance.
idea_5: This feature records melodies by humming or speaking note names, converts them into editable music charts, and enables sharing or creating challenges from the charts.
idea_6: This feature lets users select and download songs, including MIDI files, with adjustable quality and EQ settings for offline, ad-free playback.
idea_7: This feature allows users to change the piano sound, combine visual and audio effects, and activate a fair-play mode for ranked games.
idea_8: This feature lets users provide quick feedback, short text or audio comments on user-made charts, highlights highly rated charts, and offers suggestions to creators.
idea_9: This feature allows you to create playlists with transitions and filters for mood, tempo, and era. You can shuffle, play continuously, share, and auto-generate playlists from your listening history.
idea_10: This feature offers multi-level boss concerts with varying patterns, speeds, and defenses. Completing them unlocks new sounds, avatars, and global badges.

idea_1: This feature allows you to play the main melody while an AI adds harmonies, bass, or counter-melody in real time, adjusting style and difficulty to your performance.
idea_2: This feature allows you to choose a song, generates tappable note lanes from the music, provides various arrangements, and changes difficulty based on your previous results.
idea_3: This feature records a hummed or whistled tune, generates a 15–30 second music level using its key and tempo, and enables sharing for others to play.
idea_4: This feature uses vibrations and flashing lights to guide you through difficult rhythms before the song and adjusts audio and touch timing for accurate play.
idea_5: This feature uses the camera to recognize a real keyboard, displays finger numbers and falling notes on the keys, tracks hand position, and suggests finger placement for practice.
