idea_5: This feature displays a list of slot games with details like RTP, volatility, bonus frequency, bet limits, and current promotions. It also lets users set alerts for deal updates.
idea_6: This feature uses on-device AI to explain game rules, estimate session length from your bet and bankroll, detect bet-entry errors, summarize promotions, and create a personalized plan with time and loss limits.
idea_7: This feature identifies risky devices and unusual activity, activates two-factor authentication, delays payouts for verification, and secures sensitive screens and clipboard data in private mode.
idea_8: This feature lets players create slot rooms with specific schedules, entry limits, and prize settings, while the platform handles entries, result verification, and payouts automatically.
idea_9: This feature lets users design slot games by choosing themes, symbols, and sounds, publish them to a gallery, and play in practice or real-money modes after approval.
idea_10: This feature offers city and district chat rooms, friend lists, a verified wins feed with images and polls, and options to mute, block, or use private mode.

idea_1: This feature allows two players to play the same slot game with the same random seed for a fixed number of spins, and the higher total wins the combined stake minus a fee.
idea_2: This feature allows you to use Boost Cards before playing to change game volatility while keeping RTP the same. You can earn, create, or trade these cards.
idea_3: This feature saves part of each win into a separate balance that can be withdrawn or used for low-risk spins. It can be enabled or disabled each session.
idea_4: This feature ends sessions when profit, loss, or time limits are reached, recommends breaks after recent play, offers sentiment check-ins, and gives a monthly Play Health summary.
idea_5: This feature provides scheduled mini-tournaments with a live host who activates multipliers, side rewards, and giveaways, and includes real-time chat and emoji reactions.
idea_6: This feature allows friends to form a team that contributes to a shared jackpot. When the jackpot is won, payouts are split according to each member’s contribution. Squad quests unlock mini jackpots and badges.
idea_7: This feature displays possible outcomes based on your bet size and session length, using realistic variance, and lets you set a plan and safety limits before playing.
idea_8: This feature lets you set automatic spin rules based on conditions such as consecutive wins or losses, and allows you to share or import these rules.
idea_9: This feature displays virtual coins appearing after a win, lets you tap to collect rewards, and provides an option to quickly share clips of your wins.
idea_10: This feature provides timed jackpots that players in the same region or during live events can win before a countdown ends, showing progress bars and leaderboards.

idea_1: This feature lets viewers follow tutorial videos step-by-step, track their progress, and receive notifications about their practice activities.

idea_3: This feature suggests videos about local guides, weather, and attractions based on your upcoming travel dates and destinations.
idea_4: This feature adjusts sound settings to make dialogue clearer and balance audio during playback, especially when using headphones.
idea_5: This feature lets users apply filters like video length, upload date, creator type, and topic to customize their homepage and search results.
idea_6: This feature allows creators and viewers to upload and share files like PDF, PowerPoint, and DOCX in video descriptions or community posts for others to view.
idea_7: This feature lets viewers write reviews and rate videos and channels. These ratings and reviews are visible to help others evaluate the content and creators.

idea_9: This feature lets users create playlists that automatically download videos from chosen channels or topics, allowing them to watch the saved content without needing an internet connection.
idea_10: This feature shows a dashboard where users can see their long-term viewing habits, such as favorite genres and channel engagement trends, to review their YouTube activity over time.

idea_1: This feature synchronizes video playback for multiple users and provides a group chat with emoji reactions, enabling simultaneous viewing and real-time communication.

idea_1: This feature lets multiple users add photos and videos to a shared story, creating a combined collection based on a common theme or event.

idea_8: This feature uses AI to recommend optimal times to post based on past interactions with different follower groups.
idea_9: This feature lets users share visual content that plays automatically without sound and includes captions or text overlays for easier viewing in quiet environments.
idea_10: This feature lets users find, join, and create content challenges, and provides tools to track participation, vote, and choose winners.

idea_1: This feature lets users complete creative challenges with step-by-step instructions and receive feedback from other users on photography and editing techniques.

idea_3: This feature suggests Instagram accounts that your close friends frequently interact with or follow, helping you discover new creators and content based on their activity.

idea_10: This feature gathers users' geotagged posts and stories to create a summary of visited places, showing visit times, weather, and nearby points of interest.

idea_1: This feature synchronizes video playback for users watching together remotely and provides live chat, reaction emojis, voice notes, and themed mini-games during viewing.

idea_3: This feature lets users make choices during certain original shows, which then change the storyline based on the decisions they select.

idea_10: This feature automatically downloads upcoming episodes or related content based on viewing habits, storage space, and calendar travel plans, managing downloads for offline access.

idea_1: This feature lets users watch tutorials and behind-the-scenes videos about filmmaking, acting, and story development, offering educational content related to film and TV production.

idea_10: This feature lets users browse, customize, and order local food and drinks while watching. Orders are delivered contactlessly and timed to arrive during breaks.

idea_1: This feature analyzes your writing style in Google Docs and provides exercises, prompts, and style suggestions to support you during the editing process.

idea_6: This feature offers daily tasks focused on productivity, creativity, and collaboration, tracks user progress, awards badges for completed tasks, and enables sharing updates with others.

idea_9: This feature allows users to post and read reviews on public documents or templates, enabling open feedback and comments on shared files.

idea_2: This feature shows articles, data, and citations related to your document in a sidebar. It updates suggestions automatically as you type.

idea_4: This feature displays two document versions side-by-side with color highlights to show the differences between them.

idea_6: This feature creates a short summary of a long document with one click, highlighting the main points in a condensed form.
idea_7: This feature identifies language changes in a document and offers translations and grammar corrections for multiple languages within the same file.
idea_8: This feature allows users to organize tools, comments, and document panes in a workspace layout that can be customized to match their workflow and screen size.
idea_9: This feature tracks sources cited in a document, suggests related references, and automatically formats bibliographies in different citation styles.
idea_10: This feature lets users edit documents without internet access, saves changes on the device, and syncs those changes to the cloud when a connection is available.

idea_1: This feature analyzes participants’ past meeting habits and suggests appropriate meeting times, lengths, and formats such as video, call, or in-person.
idea_2: This feature automatically sorts your inbox by detecting urgent emails and grouping related conversations based on your interactions, making important messages easier to find.
idea_3: This feature lets multiple users edit the same email at the same time, allowing them to work together on drafting and editing emails within Microsoft Outlook.
idea_4: This feature simplifies complex email content into easier-to-understand language with one click, helping users communicate more clearly across various language and knowledge levels.

idea_10: This feature lets users compose, read, and manage emails using voice commands on mobile and desktop devices, enabling hands-free operation for these actions.

idea_1: This feature offers daily tips and short tutorials on email etiquette, productivity, and calendar management to help users improve communication and organization skills over time.

idea_9: This feature converts selected emails and calendar events into short spoken summaries that users can listen to for easy access to information.
idea_10: This feature uses AI to automatically complete phone numbers, email addresses, and other contact details from partial input or scanned business cards for faster contact entry.

idea_1: This feature provides a cloud-based space where users can store, organize, and manage their digital files with access to templates, tutorials, and collaboration tools.

idea_10: This feature stores files in the cloud, allowing access from multiple devices, and uses encryption to protect data while it is being transferred and stored.

idea_1: This feature uses AI to organize uploaded files by categorizing and tagging them according to their content, allowing users to locate and access files more easily.

idea_10: This feature allows users to store files in chosen geographic locations to comply with local data protection rules.

idea_1: This feature introduces weather changes such as rain and fog that impact driving by making roads slippery and lowering visibility.

idea_1: This feature adds cliff-jumping areas where players can perform aerial moves with their shark to earn points and unlock cosmetic skins, offering different movement challenges.

idea_1: This feature lets players connect several block blasts quickly to gain extra points and activate special visual effects by timing their moves accurately.

idea_1: This feature scans URLs and messages in other apps in real time and notifies users if a link is detected as potentially suspicious before it is opened.

idea_1: This feature offers short lessons and challenges about cybersecurity and includes a tool to track users’ confidence and progress over time.

idea_10: This feature lets users choose and combine various security settings like firewall options, scan depth, and notifications to create a personalized protection profile.

idea_1: This feature uses AI to monitor user activity and network speed in real-time, then suggests a VPN server that fits the current connection conditions.

idea_6: This feature allows users to choose specific apps or websites to access the internet directly, while other internet traffic continues to use the VPN connection.

idea_8: This feature uses pre-downloaded safe browsing lists and DNS protections to maintain privacy and security when the device is offline and not connected to the internet.
idea_9: This feature uses biometric authentication to verify the user's identity before granting access to the app or allowing changes to VPN settings, restricting connection actions to authorized users.
idea_10: This feature lets users export and import their VPN profiles, allowing them to move their VPN settings between devices without manually configuring them again.

idea_7: This feature notifies users when verified Proton VPN users or trusted contacts are nearby and enables communication and sharing of security information based on location.

idea_1: This feature provides interactive practice scenarios that help users learn about different types of malware and hacking techniques.

idea_1: This feature monitors app behavior in real time to identify unusual activities based on usage patterns and detects potential threats beyond known virus signatures.

idea_4: This feature scans links received via SMS or messaging apps using AI and notifies users if the links might be harmful before they open them.
idea_5: This feature monitors outgoing network traffic from the device to identify unusual patterns and notifies the user when irregular activity is detected.
idea_6: This feature scans Wi-Fi networks to check encryption, detect common security issues, and identify unauthorized access points that imitate trusted networks.
idea_7: This feature runs suspicious applications in a separate environment to isolate their activity and prevent any effects on the main system or data.
idea_8: This feature lets users schedule deep scans that use cloud processing to reduce device resource use while performing thorough threat detection.
idea_9: This feature monitors the dark web for users' personal information like email addresses or phone numbers in new data breaches and sends alerts if found.
idea_10: This feature uses fingerprint or facial recognition to control access to quarantine files and security settings within the app.

idea_1: This feature allows players to record audio notes during gameplay, capturing information such as drift strategies or track setups for later use or sharing.

idea_1: This feature monitors gameplay in real time to identify unusual behavior or integrity issues and sends instant alerts to developers when detected.

idea_6: This feature changes the level of integrity checks in real time based on detected threat levels or player behavior, adjusting the strictness according to current conditions.
idea_7: This feature allows apps to automatically apply soft penalties or restrictions when integrity violations are detected, reducing the need for manual moderation.
idea_8: This feature checks the integrity of game files, including binaries, resource files, and runtime environments, to detect any unauthorized modifications or tampering.

idea_1: This feature assigns a changing integrity risk score to apps based on their behavior patterns and updates the score as the app's behavior changes.

idea_8: This feature scans other apps to identify their unique cryptographic signatures, allowing users to check if the apps are original or have been modified.
idea_9: This feature isolates and protects sensitive apps or files in a secure vault, locking critical data to prevent tampering and unauthorized access through integrity checks.
idea_10: This feature uses AI to examine app behavior, detect unusual activities, and provide users with feedback and suggestions to help enhance device security.
